tasmāt vaktuḥ eva karaṇa vyāpārasya vyutpādanam
na bhājana ādīnām
yadi api taiḥ vinā vyutpādanam na

original: tathāpi na tāni vyutpādakāniḥ teṣāṃ śiṣyaviṣaye prerakatvābhāvāt /
analyzed: tathā api na tāni teṣām śiṣya viṣaye preraka tva abhāvāt
śiṣyaiḥ ca ityādi

original: yasmāchiṣyā ācāryaprayuktāṃ vyutpattimātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartumichanti yataste pracidyāḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt śiṣyāḥ ācārya prayuktām vyutpattim ātmanaḥ sambandhinī kartum ichanti yatas te pracidyāḥ

original: tasmāt tat prakaraṇaṃ taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam /
analyzed: tasmāt tat prakaraṇam taiḥ śrūyate iti śravaṇasya prayojanam vyutpādanam
etat ca artha dvayaṃṇicā pratipāditam

original: anyathā asādhāraṇavyāpāro vakturvyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt,
analyzed: anyathā asādhāraṇa vyāpāraḥ vaktuḥ vyutpattau na darśitaḥ syāt
śiṣyāṇām śravaṇa vyāpāraḥ ca

original: yasmāt sarva eva prayojakaparatantro pāna śayyāsanalakṣaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt sarvaḥ eva
iṣṭa aniṣṭayā uraḥ viparītaḥ saḥ upekṣaṇauyaḥ
kāraṇam samyak jñānam

original: tathāhi- pratyakṣādijñānena virdhārya śūla viṣa kaṇṭha kādikaṃ pariharati puṣpamālyādikamādatte,
analyzed: tathā hi pratyakṣa ādi jñānena śūla viṣa kaṇṭha ka ādikam pariharati puṣpa mālya ādikam ādatte
tad bhinna an anyāḥ ca upekṣate

original: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānavyutpādanāya prakaraṇamidamārabdhavatā ayamevipāyo nānya iti darśita evopāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha  #
analyzed: prekṣāvatā hi samyak jñāna vyutpādanāya prakaraṇam idam ārabdhavatā ayam eva ipāyaḥ na anyaḥ iti darśitaḥ eva upāya upeya bhāvaḥ prakaraṇa prayojanayoḥ sambandha
iti

original: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāguktānyapi abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhirna gṛhyante,
analyzed: nanu ca prakaraṇa śravaṇāt prāc uktāni api abhidheya ādīni pramāṇa abhāvāt prekṣāvadbhiḥ na gṛhyante
tat kim etaiḥ ārambha pradeśe uktaiḥ

original: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitānyapi na niścauyante /
analyzed: satyam aśrute prakaraṇe kathitāni api na niścauyante
ukteṣu tu apramāṇakeṣu api abhidheya ādiṣu saṃśayaḥ utpadyate
saṃśayāt ca pravartante
artha saṃśayaḥ pi hi pravṛti aṅga prekṣāvatām
anartha saṃśayaḥ nivṛtti aṅgam
ataeva sambandha ādīni yujyante vaktum
bhavati asati ṇici śiyyāḥ aprayojyāḥ
ye ca aprayojyāḥ te svatantrāḥ

original: svatantrāṇāṃ cācāryaprayukta vyutpattimaniccatāṃ śravaṇābhāvāt kathaṃ śravaṇavyāpārasya prayojanaṃ cintyate?- iti syitam /
analyzed: svatantrāṇām ca ācārya prayukta vyutpattim aniccatām śravaṇa abhāvāt katham śravaṇa vyāpārasya prayojanam cintyate iti

original: nanu ca yathābhidheyavyutpādanaprayojanayorapoddhāreṇa pratipādakapadaṃ kathaṃ sambandhasyāpi kimīt na kathitam?
analyzed: nanu ca yathā abhidheya vyutpādana prayojanayoḥ apoddhāreṇa pratipādaka padam katham sambandhasya api kimīd na kathitam
iti āha sambandha pradarśana padam tu ityādi

original: ayameva prakaraṇaviśeṣo laghūpāyatayā vakṣyamāṇaya nītyopāyaḥ vyutpādanam= upeyam /
analyzed: ayam eva prakaraṇa viśeṣaḥ laghu upāya tayā nītyā upāyaḥ vyutpādanam upeyam
upāya upeya sambandhaḥ ca kārya kāraṇa sambandhaḥ eva

original: sa ca pratīyata iti na padāntareṇa kathitaḥ /
analyzed: sa ca pratīyate iti na pada antareṇa kathitaḥ
tathā ca uktam
śāstram prayojanam ca eva sambandhasya āśrayāt ubhau
tad ukti antargataḥ tena bhinnaḥ na uktaḥ prayojanāt iti

original: evamādivākyenābhidheyaprayojanādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānāṃ prabṛttau tadasaṅgata emveti manyamānaścodayati- nanvityādinā /
analyzed: evamādi vākyena abhidheya prayojana ādau kathite sati prāmāṇikānām prabṛttau tad asaṅgataḥ manyamānaḥ codayati nanu ityādinā
evam manyate yaḥ hi prāmāṇikaḥ
sa pramāṇe pravartate

original: na cādivākye prayojanādinā kathitena śāstraśravaṇāt prāgvartate śāstram,
analyzed: na ca ādi vākye prayojana ādinā kathitena śāstra śravaṇāt prāk vartate śāstram
ādi vākyasya aprāmāṇyāt
aprāmāṇyam ca arthena saha asambandhāt cabdasya
etaiḥ iti
abhidheya ādibhiḥ
ārambha pradeśa uktaiḥ iti
ādau uktaiḥ iti arthaḥ
ukteṣu ityādi
evam manyate yadi api asya apramāṇam prayojana pratipādakam ādi vacanam
tathā api śāstra ādau pratipādanīyam artha saṃśaya janana artham

original: yo hi samaygjñānārthī sa tathābhutaṃ śāstrakartu rādivākyaṃ śrutvātatra saṃśete,
analyzed: yaḥ hi samayā jñāna arthī sa tathā abhutam śāstra kartuḥ rādi vākyam śrutvā tatra saṃśete
saṃśayāt ca pravartate iti tātparyam
atas eva iti
yatas eva ādi vākye na artha saṃśayaḥ
saṃśayāt ca pravṛtiḥ
ataeva śāstra kāreṇa eva sarva puruṣa artha siddhiḥ iti sarva puruṣa artha sādhakam
siddhi śabdena atra sādhakam ucyate

original: tena sarvapuruṣārthasiddhau niścitameva samyagjñānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavatīti pradarśitam /
analyzed: tena sarva puruṣa artha siddhau niścitam eva samyak jñānam kāraṇam bhavati iti pradarśitam

original: itiśabdaḥ vyākhyātaṇāṃ hi vacana krīḍādyarthamanyathāpi sambhāvyate /
analyzed: iti śabdaḥ hi krīḍā ādi artham anyathā api sambhāvyate

original: śastrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītabhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanamutpaśyāmaḥ,
analyzed: śastrakṛtām tu prakaraṇa prārambhe na viparīta abhidheya ādi abhidhāne prayojanam utpaśyāmaḥ
na api pravṛttim
atas teṣu saṃśayaḥ yuktaḥ
an ukteṣu tu pratipattṛbhiḥ niṣprayojanam abhidheyam sambhāvyeta asya prakaraṇasya
kākadanta parīkṣāyāḥ iva
aśakya anuṣṭhānam vā
jvarahara takṣaka cūḍāratna alaṅkāra upadeśa vat
anabhimatam vā prayojanam mātṛ vivāha krama upadeśa vat
atas vā prakaraṇāt laghutaraḥ upāyaḥ prayojanasya
anupāye eva vā prakaraṇam sambhāvyeta

original: etāsu cānarthasambhāvanāsu ekasyāmapyanarthasambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante /
analyzed: etāsu ca anartha sambhāvanāsu ekasyām api anartha sambhavanāyām na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante
abhidheya ādiṣu tu ukteṣu atha sambhāvanā anartha sambhāvanā viruddhā utpadyate
tathā prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante

original: iti prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyaṅgamarthasambhāvanāṃ kartu sambandhādīnyabhidhīyanta iti sthitam /
analyzed: iti prekṣāvatām pravṛtti aṅgam artha sambhāvanām kartu sambandha ādīni abhidhīyante iti sthitam
yujyate vaktum
na ākhyāna kartrā iti

original: tena yaduktaṃ kenacid- 'vyākhyānakārā eva prayojanādīni pratipādayaisaynti' iti,
analyzed: tena yat uktam kenacid vyākhyāna kārāḥ eva prayojana ādīni iti
tat pratyuktam

original: utpaśyāma ityādinaitad darśayati- yadyapi pramāṇaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: utpaśyāmaḥ ityādinā etat darśayati yadi api pramāṇam na asti
mahatā prabandhena śāstra karaṇāt sambhāvyate iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ca vādhakasādhakapramāṇābhāvāt samyagjñānavyutpattyarthī vināpi āvidacanena saṃśayānastatra pravartate- iti kimādivākyena tatroktena?
analyzed: nanu ca vādhaka sādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt samyak jñāna vyutpatti arthī vinā api āvid acanena saṃśayānaḥ tatra pravartate iti kimādi vākyena tatra uktena
iti āha anukteṣu ityādi
evam manyate yaḥ hi amūḍhaḥ
tam prati na kartavyam eva
yaḥ hi kākadanta parīkṣā ādi śāstram dṛṣṭvā prayojana ādi rahitam
atra api aprayojanāḥ sambhāvayan anartha saṃśete
anartha saṃśayāt ca pravarttate
tam prati etat kathanasya prayojanam

original: kathite ca vacane śāstrakāreṇa tadanurodhād vacanādarthasaṃśayo jāyate,
analyzed: kathite ca vacane śāstra kāreṇa tad anurodhāt vacanāt artha saṃśayaḥ jāyate
tatas pravartate iti arthaḥ
anartha saṃśayaḥ yaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ bhavati tat nidarśayati niṣprayojana nitya ādinā

original: ato vā prakaraṇādanyasya prakaraṇasya laghutaropāyatāṃ sambhāvyāsya prakaraṇasyasāratayā anupāyatā syādityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas vā prakaraṇāt anyasya prakaraṇasya laghutara upāya tām sambhāvyā asya prakaraṇasya asāra tayā anupāya tā syāt iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāyāvayavārtha darśayitumāha- avisaṃvādakamityādi /
analyzed: evam samudāyena vākyasya tātparya vyākhyāya avayava artha darśayitum āha avisaṃvādakam ityādi

original: 'avisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ' iti bruvatā ṭīkākṛtā arthāvabodhakaṃ jñānaṃ mīmāṃsakaparikalpitam,
analyzed: avisaṃvādakam jñānam samyak jñānam iti bruvatā ṭīkā kṛtā artha avabodhakam jñānam mīmāṃsaka parikalpitam
artha darśanam ca cārvāka upakalpitam

original: athāpi viparītaṃ jñānaṃ kaiścit parikalpitaṃ samyaktvena,
analyzed: atha api viparītam jñānam kaiścid parikalpitam samyaktvena
tat nirastam sarvam
eteṣām samyak jñāna lakṣaṇa abhāvāt
yathā na ca tāni samyak jñānāni
tathā svayam ṭīkāyām apahastitāni
tasmāt iti arthe
yad tadaḥ nitya saṃbandhau
tena yasmāt sarva puruṣa artha siddhau samyak jñānam pūrva bhāvi
tasmāt eva tat vyutpādyate iti ukta bhavati
avisaṃvādakam jñānam samyak jñānam
loke ca pūrvam upadarśitam artha prāpayat saṃvādakam ucyate
pradarśite ca arthe pravartaka tvam eva prāpakam na anyat

original: tathā hi- na jñānaṃ janayad artha prāpayati,
analyzed: tathā hi na jñānam janayat artha prāpayati
api tu arthe puruṣam pravartayat prāpayati artham

original: na hi puruṣaṃ haṭhāt pravartayituṃ śaknoti vijñānam /
analyzed: na hi puruṣam haṭhāt pravartayitum śaknoti vijñānam
atas eva ca artha adhigatiḥ eva pramāṇa phalam
adhigate ca arthe pravartitaḥ puruṣaḥ
prāpitaḥ ca arthaḥ

original: tathā ca sati arthādhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca sati artha adhigamāt samāptaḥ pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ
atas eva ca anadhigata viṣayam pramāṇam
yena eva hi jñānena prathamam adhigataḥ rthaḥ
tena eva pravartita pruruṣaḥ
prāpitaḥ ca arthaḥ

original: tatreva ca arthe kimanyena jñānenādhikaṃ kāryam /
analyzed: tatra iva ca arthe kim anyena jñānena adhikam kāryam
atas dhigata viṣayam apramāṇam

original: tatra yo 'rtho dṛṣṭatvena jñāttaḥ sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛttiviṣayīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ rthaḥ dṛṣṭa tvena sa pratyakṣeṇa pravṛtti viṣayīkṛtaḥ
yasmāt yasmin arthe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāri tva vyāpāraḥ vikalpena anugamyate

original: tasya ekasminnevārthe trayāṇāṃ jñānātāṃ pradarśaka pravartaka prāpakabhedena prāmāṇyamiṣṭaṃ pareṇa,
analyzed: tasya ekasmin eva arthe trayāṇām pradarśaka pravartaka prāpaka bhedena prāmāṇyam iṣṭam pareṇa
tat nirākartum mā āha
pradarśite ca arthe ityādi

original: pradarśite cārthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yad dvitīyaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivārthe puruṣasya pravarttakam,
analyzed: pradarśite ca arthe prathamena darśakena jñānena yat dvitīyam jñānam tatra eva arthe puruṣasya pravarttakam
tṛtīyam api tatra eva arthe prāpakam
tatas na adyāt adhikam prāpaṇa yogyīkaraṇena iti tat eva pramāṇam
amum eva artha samarthayati tathā hi ityādinā
na janayat na utpādayat artham sva hetoḥ eva arthasya utpanna tvāt
anena pravartakāt prāpakasya abhedaḥ darśitaḥ
pravartakasya api pradarśakāt abhedam darśayitum āha pravṛtti ityādi

original: yat pradarśakamādāvutpannamarthe jñānaṃ tadeva pravṛttiviṣayaṃ karoti,
analyzed: yat pradarśakam ādau utpannam arthe jñānam tat eva pravṛtti viṣayam karoti
pravṛtti viṣaya yogyī karoti iti arthaḥ
na tu dvitīyam jñānam
ādayena eva pravṛtti viṣaya yogyīkṛta tvāt
api śabdaḥ pūrva apekṣaḥ
atas eva ityādinā ācārya granthe sva matam saṃvādayati
kutas yam labhyate yadā prathamam darśayati eva
na pravartayati na prāpayati
dvitīyam api pravarttayati eva
na prāpayati
evam sati anyat pradarśaka pramāṇam anyat pravartana ādika phalam
na ca evam tasmāt yuktam uktam

original: nanu ca yadyapyarthādhigatireva pramāṇaphalaṃ tathāpi yāvaduttare pravartaka-prāpakajñane na bhavataḥ,
analyzed: nanu ca yadi api artha adhigatiḥ eva pramāṇa phalam tathā api yāvat uttare pravartaka prāpaka jñane na bhavataḥ
tatra arthe tāvat na pramāṇa vyāpāra parisamāptiḥ iti āha adhigate ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- adhigate cārthe samāptaḥ pramāṇavyāpāra iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye 'nupayogitvam,
analyzed: evam manyate adhigate ca arthe samāptaḥ pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ iti tayoḥ prāmāṇye karttavye n upayogi tvam
a taḥ pramāṇe te
katham samāptaḥ pramāṇa vyāpāraḥ kaḥ vā asau
iti āha atas eva iti
sva vyāpāraḥ

original: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā cārthādhigatyā kṛta iti samāpto tadvayutpādyata iti /
analyzed: sa ca niścayaḥ prathamayā ca artha adhigatyā kṛtaḥ iti tat vayutpādyate iti

original: atra taditi samyagjñānaṃ yojanīyam napusaṃkaliṅgena svarupanirdeśāt /
analyzed: atra tat iti samyak jñānam yojanīyam napusaṃka liṅgena
na tu avyavahitā sarva puruṣa artha siddhiḥ
a prādhānyāt

original: pradarśakaṃ pratyakṣam tasmād dṛṣṭatayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣadarśitaḥ /
analyzed: pradarśakam pratyakṣam tasmāt dṛṣṭa tayā jñātaḥ pratyakṣa darśitaḥ
anumānam tu liṅga darśanāt niścinvat pravṛtti diṣayam darśayati
tathā ca pratyakṣam partibhāsamānam niyatam artha darśayati
anumānam ca liṅga sambaddham niyatam artha darśayati
atas ete niyatasya arthasya pradarśake
tena te pramāe
na anyat vijñānam
prāptum śakyam artham ādarśayat prāpakam
prāpaka tvāt ca pramāṇam

original: ābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāmanyena ca jñānena darśito 'rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ,
analyzed: ābhyām pramāṇābhyām anyena ca jñānena darśitaḥ rthaḥ kaścid atyanta vipartyastaḥ

original: yathā- marīcikāsu jalamḥ sa cāsatvāt prāptumaśakyaḥ /
analyzed: yathā marīcikāsu jalam sa ca a sattvāt prāptum aśakyaḥ
kaścid aniyataḥ bhāva abhāvayoḥ
yathā saṃśaya arthaḥ

original: na ca bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ yukto 'rtho jagatyastiḥ tataḥ prāptumaśakyastādṛśaḥ /
analyzed: na ca bhāva abhāvābhyām yuktaḥ rthaḥ jagatī astiḥ tatas prāptum aśakyaḥ tādṛśaḥ
vyāpāraḥ tavatā eva puruṣasya pravṛtteḥ
atas dvitīya ādīnām atra eva arthe dhikaḥ vyāpāraḥ na asti iti
adhigata gantṛ tvāt aprāmāṇyam iti arthaḥ
pravartitaḥ puruṣaḥ iti
pravartana yogya tvāt pravartitaḥ iti ucyate
prāpaṇa yogya tvāt prāpitaḥ

original: evam sāmānyena saṃvādakaṃ samyagjñānaṃ pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣānumāne svavyāpāraṃ kurvatī samyagjñāne bhavata iti darśayannāha- tatra  #
analyzed: evam sāmānyena saṃvādakam samyak jñānam pratipādya viśeṣeṇa ca pratyakṣa anumāne sva vyāpāram kurvatī samyak jñāne bhavataḥ iti darśayan āha tatra
yaḥ rthaḥ ityādinā
tatra tayoḥ madhye pratyakṣasya vyāpāram darśayati
dṛṣṭa tvena jñātaḥ dṛṣṭa tvena niścitaḥ
vikalpena anugamyate iti
tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinā vikalpe na avasīyate

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- pratibhāsamānārthavyavasāyaṃ kurvat pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ samvādakanityarthaḥ /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati pratibhāsamāna artha vyavasāyam kurvat pratyakṣam pramāṇam
anumānam tu ityādinā anumānasya pravṛtti viṣayam darśayati
liṅga darśanam liṅga jñānam

original: tacca vahnayavyabhivāridhūmaniścayanaṃ sāmānyena sādhyābinābhāvi ca smaraṇajñānam /
analyzed: tat ca vahnaya vyabhivāri dhūma niścayanam sāmānyena sādhya abinābhāvi ca smaraṇa jñānam

original: yathā dhūmaṃpratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayaṃ vahnijaḥ iti smaraṇam /
analyzed: yathā dhūmam pratyakṣeṇa gṛhītvā sarvatra ayam vahni jaḥ iti smaraṇam
tasmāt liṅga jñānāt niścinvat pravṛtti viṣayam darśayati
tat anumānam viśiṣṭa sambandhena yat udeti jñānam

original: yathā atratyo dhūmo vahnijaḥ iti jānam /
analyzed: yathā atratyaḥ dhūmaḥ vahni jaḥ iti
etat uktam bhavati pratyakṣasya sva viṣaya niścaya janana vyāpāraḥ bhinnaḥ

original: anumānasya tuliṅgadarśanāt svaviṣaye niścayātmanotpattireva niścayavyāpāra iti /
analyzed: anumānasya tu liṅga darśanāt sva viṣaye niścaya ātmanā utpattiḥ eva niścaya vyāpāraḥ iti

original: tathā ce yādinā anayordaśitaṃ vyāpāraṃ spaṣṭayati /
analyzed: tathā ca i yādinā anayoḥ daśitam vyāpāram spaṣṭayati

original: ata ete pramāṇe nānyadvijñānam ityevaṃ bruvatā ete eva samyagjñāne nānyāni śabdādīni /
analyzed: atas ete pramāṇe na anyat vijñānam iti evam bruvatā ete eva samyak jñāne na anyāni śabda ādīni
teṣām niyata artha an upadarśaka tvāt iti samyak jñānasya pravṛttiḥ daśitā
yathā ete pramāṇe
saśaya ādi jñānam na tathā pramāṇam
prāptu śakyam tyādinā darśayati

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yathā pratyakṣānumāne svenasvena pramāṇenopadarśitārthasya prāpake,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yathā pratyakṣa anumāne svena svena pramāṇena upadarśita arthasya prāpake
na tathā saṃśaya viparyaya jñāneḥ tathabhūtasya arthasya a bhāvāt iti

original: sarveṇa cāliṅgajena vikalpena vinyāmakamadṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhavābhāvayo raniyata evārtho darśayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṇa ca a liṅga jena vikalpena vinyāmakam a dṛṣṭvā pravṛttena bhava abhāvayoḥ a niyataḥ eva arthaḥ darśayitavyaḥ
sa ca prāptum aśakyaḥ
tasmāt aśakya prāpaṇam atyanta viparītam

original: bhāvābhāvāniyataṃ cārtha darśa yat apramāṇam anyad vijñānam /
analyzed: bhāva abhāva aniyatam yat a pramāṇam anyat vijñānam
arthakriyā arthibhiḥ ca arthakriyā samartha vastu prāpti nimittam jñānam mṛgyate
yat ca taiḥ mṛgyate tat eva śāstre vicāryate
tatas ṛthakriyā vastu pradarśakam samyak jñānam
yat ca tena pradarśitam yat eva prāpaṇīyam
artha adhigama ātmakam hi prāpakam iti uktam
tatra pradarśitāt anyat vastu bhinna ākāram
bhinna kālam
bhinna deśam ca
viruddha dharma saṃsargāt hi anyat vastu
deśa kāla ākāra bhedaḥ ca viruddha dharma saṃsargaḥ

original: yasmādanyākāravadvastugrāhi nākārāntaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prītaśaṅkhagrāhi śukle śaṅkha /
analyzed: yasmāt anya ākāravat vastu grāhi na ākāra antaravati vastuni pramāṇam yathā prīta śaṅkha grāhi śukle śaṅkha

original: deśāntarasthagrāhi ca na deśāntarasthe pramāṇam yathā- kuñcikāvivaradiśasthāyāṃ maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇigrāhi jñānaṃ nāpavarakasye maṇau /
analyzed: deśa antara stha grāhi ca na deśa antara sthe pramāṇam yathā kuñcikā vivara diśa sthāyām maṇi prabhāyām maṇi grāhi jñānam na apavaraka sye maṇau

original: kālāntarayyuktagrāhi ca na kālāntaravarti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhnakālavastugrāhi svapnajñānaṃ ardharātrakāle vastuni pramāṇam
analyzed: ca na kāla antara varti vastuni pramāṇam yathā ardharātre madhyāhna kāla vastu grāhi svapna jñānam ardharātra kāle vastuni pramāṇam

original: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāvaparyajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam,
analyzed: nanu ca mā bhūt saṃśaryāva paryajñanayoḥ prāmāṇyam

original: tathābhūtasyārthasyāsattvāditiḥ yat punaḥ iha kūpe jalam iti jñānaṃ tat pramāṇāntaraṃ kimiti na bhavati?
analyzed: tathābhūtasya arthasya asattvāt iti yat punar iha kūpe jalam iti jñānam tat pramāṇa antaram kim iti na bhavati
na tāvat pratyakṣam
tatra jalasya parokṣa tvāt na api anumānam
liṅga abhāvāt na api saṃśaya rūpam
ubhaya aṃśa abhāvāt na api viparītam
viparīta artha abhāvāt
iti āśaṅkayā āha sarveṇa ca aliṅga jena ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- yadayapi sākṣāt saṃśayajñānaṃ na pratīyate,
analyzed: evam manyate sākṣāt saṃśaya jñānam na pratīyate

original: yastu saṃśayavikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam ityevañjātīyasyaḥ tathāpi niyāmakaṃ liṅgamantareṇa tadapramāṇam,
analyzed: yaḥ tu saṃśaya vikalpakasya jñānasya iha kūpe jalam iti evañjātīyasyaḥ tathā api niyāmakam liṅgam antareṇa tat apramāṇam
niyata artha a pariccedāt

original: tataścāyamarthaḥ- syāt kadācit kūpe jalam iti taccaivaṃ svarūpam,
analyzed: tatas ca ayam arthaḥ syāt kadācid kūpe jalam iti tat ca evam svarūpam
tat saṃśaya jñānam eva iti apramāṇam

original: yat punastatra pravṛttena kadācijjalaṃ labhayate tajjñānāntarāditi viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ pratipāditam /
analyzed: yat punar tatra pravṛttena kadācid jalam labhayate tad jñāna antarāt iti viniścayaṭīkāyām pratipāditam

original: nanu ca yadayapi saṃśayādīnāmupadarśitasyārthasya prāpakatvaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: nanu ca saṃśaya ādīnām upadarśitasya arthasya prāpaka tvam na asti
kim tāni na vyutpādayante
iti āha artha kriyā arthibhiḥ ca ityādi
puruṣa artha siddhau anupayoga gāt iti abhiprāyaḥ
nanu ca yat api upadarśita artha prāpaṇāt pramāṇam samyak jñānam
kuñcikā vivare maṇi prabhāyām maṇi jñānam
ardharatre madhyāhna kāla vastu grāhi svapna jñānam
nanu ca deśa niyatam

original: ākāraniyataṃ ca prāpayitu śakyam yatkālaṃ tu pariccinnaṃ tatkālaṃ na śakyaṃ prāpayitum?
analyzed: ākāra niyatam ca prāpayitu śakyam yad kālam tu pariccinnam tad kālam na śakyam prāpayitum

original: nocyate- yasminneva kāle pariccidayate tasminneva kāle prāpayitavyamiti,
analyzed: na ucyate yasmin eva kāle pariccidayate tasmin eva kāle prāpayitavyam iti
ayaḥ hi darśana kālaḥ
anyaḥ ca prāpti kālaḥ

original: kintu yatkālaṃ pariccinnaṃ tadeva tena prāpaṇīyam /
analyzed: kintu yad kālam pariccinnam tat eva tena prāpaṇīyam
abheda adhyavasayāt ca santāna gatam eka tvam draṣṭavyam iti
kāraṇam yasyāḥ sā yathā uktā
kāryāt pūrva bhavat kāraṇam pūrvam uktam

original: kāraṇaśabdopādāne tu pruṣārthasiddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇaṃ gamyeta /
analyzed: kāraṇa śabda upādāne tu pruṣa artha siddhaḥ sākṣāt kāraṇam gamyeta
pūrva śabde pūrva mātram
dvividham ca samyak jñānam
artha kriyā asmarthe ca pravartakam
tayoḥ madhye yat pravartakam tat iha parikṣayate
tat ca pūrva mātram
na tu sākṣāt kāraṇam
samyak jñāne hi sati pūrva dṛṣṭa smaraṇam
smaraṇāt abhilāṣaḥ abhilāṣāt pravṛttiḥ
pravatteḥ ca prāptiḥ
tatas na sākṣāt hetuḥ
ca pramāṇam prāpnoti iti ebhiḥ upadaśitasya artha mātrasya prāpteḥ
tatas ca samyak jñānam iti āśaṅkayā āha artha adhigama ātmakam hi ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- ebhirupadarśitasyārthasya pītākārasya kuñjikāvivarasthasya maṇairniyatadeśasya,
analyzed: evam manyate ebhiḥ upadarśitasya arthasya pīta ākārasya kuñjikā vivara sthasya maṇaiḥ niyata deśasya
niyata kālasya ca ardharātre prāpaṇāt
deśa kāla vyatiriktasya avayava ādeḥ abhāvāt
atas eva tāni apramāṇāni eva
na samyak jñānāni iti
vyāvarttyāni tatra eva abhrānta grahaṇa prastāve darśayitavyāni
tathā api iha samyak jñāna vyāvartya prastāvāt kathitāni iti adoṣaḥ
nanu ca ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate codakaḥ- deśākrābhyāṃ niyatasya prāptuṃ śakyatvāda bhavatvanyākārasyānyadeśasya ca prāptāvapramāṇam,
analyzed: evam manyate codakaḥ deśa ākrābhyām niyatasya prāptum śakya tvāt bhavatu anya ākārasya anya deśasya ca prāptau apramāṇam
na tu anya kālasya
niyata kālasya ca aprāpteḥ kṣaṇika tvāt bhagavānām

original: tataśca yathā satyanīle nīlajñānasyānyo grāhyakālo 'nyaśca prāpyakālaḥ,
analyzed: tatas ca yathā sati anīle nīla jñānasya anyaḥ grāhya kālaḥ nyaḥ ca prāpya kālaḥ
atha ca kāla bhede pi prāmāṇyam
tathā svapana jñānasya artharātra upadarśitam madhyāhna kāla putra prāpaṇasya prāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati iti

original: nocyate ityādinā siddhāntavādī tvevaṃ manyate- satyaṃ kṣaṇabhedena vastuno bhedo 'styevaḥ kintu kṣaṇāpekṣayā na prāmānyalakṣaṇamucyate,
analyzed: na ucyate ityādinā siddhānta vādī tu evam manyate satyam kṣaṇa bhedena vastunaḥ bhedaḥ kintu kṣaṇa apekṣayā na prāmānya lakṣaṇam ucyate
api tu santāna apekṣayā

original: tataśca nīlādo ya eva santānaḥ pariccinno nīlajñānena,
analyzed: tatas ca nīla ādaḥ yaḥ eva santānaḥ pariccinnaḥ nīla jñānena
saḥ eva tena prāpitaḥ
tena pramāṇam nīla jñānam

original: na tathā sthūlakālabhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptnajñānam /
analyzed: na tathā sthūla kāla bhedena pradarśitasya putrasya svaptna jñānam
na prāpti kāla bhedena
santāna eka adhyavasāya ayogāt
santāna gatam ekatvam draṣṭavyam iti anena niścaya pravṛttyoḥ hetu hetumat bhāvam darśayati
sa ca hetu hetu sadbhāvaḥ katham bhavati
yadi santāna apekṣayā prāmāṇyam avatiṣṭhate
na a lkṣaṇa apekṣayā iti
samyak jñānam pūrvam kāraṇam yasyāḥ iti
katham pūrva śabdaḥ kāraṇe vartate
iti āha kāryāt ityādi
kāraṇa śabdaḥ eva kasmāt na kṛtaḥ
iti āha kāraṇa śabdaḥ ityādi

original: kima arthakriyānirbhāsaṃ tu yadyapi sākṣātprāptiḥ tathāpi tanna parīkṣyam /
analyzed: arthakriyā nirbhāsam tu yadi api sākṣāt prāptiḥ tathā api tat na parīkṣyam
yatra eva hi prekṣāvantaḥ rthinaḥ sa āśaṅkāḥ
yat parīkṣyate

original: arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ,
analyzed: arthakriyā nirbhāse ca jñāte sati siddhaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ
tena tatra na sa āśaṅkāḥ arthinaḥ
atas tat na parīkṣaṇīyam

original: tasmāt parīkṣārhamasākṣāt kāraṇaṃ samyagjñānamādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: tasmāt parīkṣā arham asākṣāt kāraṇam samyak jñānam ādarśayitum kāraṇa śabdam parityajya pūrva grahaṇam kṛtam
puruṣasya arthaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ
arthyate iti arthaḥ
kāmyate iti yāvat
heyaḥ rthaḥ upādeyaḥ vā
heyaḥ hi arthaḥ hātum iṣyate
upādeyā u pi upādātum
na ca heya upādeyābhyām anyaḥ rāśiḥ asti

original: upekṣaṇīyo hyanupādeyatvād heya nantakāraṇaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: upekṣaṇīyaḥ hi anupādeya tvāt heya nanta kāraṇam jñānam bhavati
yad apekṣayā vyavahitasya grahaṇa artha pūrva śabda grahaṇa kṛtam
iti āha dvividhān ityādi
nanu kim ucyate artha kriyā nirbhāsam jñānam anantaram kāraṇam
nahi tat kāraṇa jñānam
evam tu yujyate vaktum yat sādhana nirbhāsi anantaram jñānam arthakriyā nirbhāsa jñānam upajanayati
tat sādhana jñānam anantara kāraṇam iti ucyate
tat eva atra abhipretam arthakriyā nirbhāsa śabdena
katham arthakriyāyāḥ nirbhāsaḥ pratibimbanam
tad ākāra jñāna utpattiḥ yasmāt anantara jñānāt tat sādhana jñānam
evam atra api samāsaḥ kartavyaḥ
athavā artha kriyā jñānam eva anantara kāraṇam

original: tat prāpitaheyopādayānuṣṭhāan vyavhārāpekṣayā pravartakamiti vyavahitaṃ sādhananirbhāsajñānam /
analyzed: tat vyavhāra apekṣayā pravartakam iti vyavahitam sādhana nirbhāsa jñānam
anantaram eva kim iti na parīkṣayate
iti āha aytrā eva hi ityādi
yatra eva puruṣasya sandehaḥ
tat eva parīkṣyate
na ca anantara sādhana jñāne sandehaḥ tad anantaram

original: tayoranubhave sati sādhanajñānāt pravatituṃ vā yujyata iti na praikṣārham /
analyzed: tayoḥ anubhave sati sādhana jñānāt pravatitum vā yujyate iti na praikṣā arham
yat vā arthakriyā nirbhāsasya anayā yuktyā na parīkṣā arha tvam iti
arthyataḥ ityādi
artha yācñāyām ityasya karmaṇi ghaṃ
aryate iti api draṣṭavyam
upalakṣaṇa tvāt asya ārteḥ auṇādikaḥ sthan pratyayaḥ
heyaḥ rthaḥ ityādinā vinītadevasya vyākhyā dūṣitā

original: tena hya vaṃ vyākayātam arthaśabdena prayojanamucyate,
analyzed: artha śabdena prayojanam ucyate
puruṣasya prayojanam dāru pāka ādi
tasya siddhiḥ niṣpattiḥ iti

original: taccāyuktam yasmādarthasya dārupākāderna samyagjñānānniṣpattiḥ, kiṃ tarhi?
analyzed: tat ca ayuktam yasmāt arthasya dāru pāka ādeḥ na samyak jñānāt niṣpattiḥ kim tarhi

original: svahetoreva vahnayādeḥ dharmottaravyākhyāne tu heyopādeyārthaviṣayā yā siddhiḥ= anuṣṭhitiḥ,
analyzed: sva hetoḥ eva vahnaya ādeḥ dharmottara vyākhyāne tu heya upādeya artha viṣayā yā siddhiḥ anuṣṭhitiḥ
sā samyak jñāna pūrvikā iti na doṣaḥ

original: amumevārtha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānamanuṣthānam iti /
analyzed: amum eva artha darśayiṣyati heyasya ca hānam anuṣthānam iti
nanu ca heya upādeya āgbhyām anyaḥ pi upekṣaṇī asti
tasya kim iti na kathanam eva
tasya asiddhiḥ hānam
upādānam ca
hetu nibandhanā hi siddhi utpattiḥ ucyate
jñāna nibandhanā tu siddhiḥ anuṣthānam
heyasya ca hānam anuṣṭhānam
upādeyasya ca upādānam
tatas heya upādeyayoḥ hāna upādāna lakṣaṇa anuṣṭhitiḥ siddhiḥ ucyate
sarvā ca asau puruṣa artha siddhiḥ ca iti
sarva śabdaḥ iha dravya kārtsnye vṛttaḥ
na tu prakāra kātsnrye
tatas na ayam arthaḥ dvi prakārā api siddhiḥ samyak jñāna nibandhanā eva iti

original: api tvayamarthaḥ- yā kācit siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnaivāsau samyagjñānanibandhaneti /
analyzed: api tu ayam arthaḥ yā kācid siddhiḥ sā sarvā kṛtsnā eva asau samyak jñāna nibandhanā iti
mithyā jñānāt hi kākatālīyā api na arsti artha siddhiḥ
tathā hi yadi pradarśitam artha prāpayati
evam tatas bhavati artha siddhiḥ
pradarśitam ca prāpayat samyak jñānam eva

original: pradarśitaṃ cāprāpayat miethyajñānam aprāpakaṃ ca kathamarthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt tasmād yanmithyājñānaṃ na tato 'rthasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: pradarśitam ca aprāpayat miethya jñānam a prāpakam ca katham artha siddhi nibandhanam syāt tasmāt yat mithyājñānam na tatas ṛtha siddhiḥ
yatas ca artha siddhiḥ tat samyak jñānam eva

original: ata eva samyagjñānaṃ yatnato vyutpādanīyam yatastadeva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam /
analyzed: atas eva samyak jñānam yatnataḥ vyutpādanīyam yatas tat eva puruṣa artha siddhi nibandhanam

original: tato yāvadū brūyāta-yā kācit puruṣārthasiddhiḥ sā samyagjñānanibandhanaiveti,
analyzed: tatas yāvat kācid puruṣa artha siddhiḥ sā samyak jñāna nibandhanā evā iti
tāvat uktam sarvā sā samyak jñāna pūrvikā iti
iti śabdaḥ tasmāt iti asmin artha yad tadoḥ ca nityam abhisambandhaḥ

original: tadayamarthaḥ- yasmāt samyagityāha- na ca heyetyādi /
analyzed: tat ayam arthaḥ yasmāt samyak iti āha na ca heya ityādi
evam manyate satyam asti
kintu tasya anupādeya tvāt heya tvam eva iti na pṛthak kathanam

original: tena yaduktaṃ kaiścit- heyopādeyayoḥ puruṣārthopayogitvāt kathanam,
analyzed: tena yat uktam kaiścid heya upādeyayoḥ puruṣa artha upayogi tvāt kathanam
upekṣaṇīyasya tad viparyamāt na kathanam iti
tat pratyuktam
vyācaṣṭe uttareṇa granthena
sarva śabdaḥ ityādinā ṭīkā kṛtām vyākhyām dūṣayati
vinīta deva śānta bhadrābhyām evam āśaṅkaya vyākhyātam
katham āśaṅkitam
na tu sarvā hāna upādāna artha siddhiḥ samyak
jñānāt eva
api tu mithyā jñānāt api kākatālīyā iti āśaṅkaya parihutam
satyam asti kintu evam vyākhyāyate sarva śabdhaḥ yam prakāra vācī
tena ayam arthaḥ sarva puruṣa artha siddhiḥ dvi prakārā hāna upādāna artha siddhi lakṣaṇā
laukika lokottara artha siddhi lakṣaṇā samyak jñāna nibandhanā bāhulyena iti
tat dūṣitam yasmāt sarva śabdaḥ tra draṣṭavyaḥ
kātsnrye varatte
sarva brahmaṇā sṛṣṭam iti
tena ayam arthaḥ kṛtsna artha siddhiḥ hāna upādāna lakṣaṇā
sarvā samyak jñānāt eva
na mithyājñānāt aprārthapti asiddheḥ iti
amum eva artham anantareṇa granthena darśayati
dvi prakārā api ityādinā para vyākhyām darśayati
api tu ayam arthaḥ ityādinā ātmīyām vyākhyām

original: tato yāvad brūyādityādinopasaṃhāravyājenevaśabdena prayuktenāvadhāraṇārthavācinā yāvānarthastāvāneva sarvaśabdena prayuktena kṛtsnārthavācinā  #
analyzed: tatas yāvat brūyāt ityādinā upasaṃhāra vyājena ivaśabdena prayuktena avadhāraṇa artha vācinā yāvān arthaḥ tāvān eva sarva śabdena prayuktena kṛtsna artha vācinā
bhavati iti darśayati
tat ca samyak jñānam vipratipatti catuṣṭaya nirākaraṇena yathārthataḥ jñāyate
vipratipatti catuṣṭayam tu saṃkhyā vipratipattiḥ
viṣaya vipratipattiḥ
phala vipratipattiḥ ca iti
tatra saṃkhyā vipratipattiḥ keṣāñcid ekam iti
yathā bārhaspatyānām
keṣāñcid trīṇoti
yathā sāṅkhayānām
naiyāyikānām catvāri

yaḥ tu amayoḥ anuvādam kṛtvā pratyakṣa tvam vidadhāti

original: tenāpyatra lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāvo viparītamākhyātaṃ bhaṅgayāḥ yato lakṣaṇavidhānakāle lakṣyamanūdaya lakṣaṇavidhīyate,
analyzed: tena api atra lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāvaḥ viparītam ākhyātam bhaṅgayāḥ yatas lakṣaṇa vidhāna kāle lakṣyam anūdaya lakṣaṇā vidhīyate
na tu lakṣaṇam anūdaya lakṣyam vidhīyate

original: siddhe tu lakṣyalakṣaṇabhāve sati lakṣaṇasanūdaya lakṣyaṃ vidhīyate,
analyzed: siddhe tu lakṣya lakṣaṇa bhāve sati lakṣaṇa sanūdaya lakṣyam vidhīyate

original: aythā- yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti /
analyzed: aythā yaḥ śikhāvān sa parivrājakaḥ iti
śikhā lakṣaṇa vidhāna kāle tu parivrājaka anuvādena śikhā eva vidhīyate

original: viparītavidhānamityanyadapi asminmate dūṣaṇaṃ dattvaṃ viniścayaṭīkāyā ṭīkākṛtteti tatraiva draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: viparīta vidhānam iti anyat api asmin mate dūṣaṇam viniścayaṭīkāyāḥ ṭīkā kṛt tā iti tatra eva draṣṭavyam

original: nanu ca lakṣaṇavidhipakṣe pratyakṣasyādyāpyasiddhatvādanūdyaṃ na sambhavati,
analyzed: nanu ca lakṣaṇa vidhi pakṣe pratyakṣasya adya api asiddha tvāt anūdyam na sambhavati
tatas ca katham pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam anūdya lakṣaṇam vijñāpyate

original: aythā- śikhayā parivrājakaḥ ityatra śikhālakṣaṇamanūdya kalpanāpoḍhādi vidhīyate?
analyzed: śikhayā parivrājakaḥ iti atra śikhā lakṣaṇam anūdya kalpanā apoḍha ādi vidhīyate
iti āśaṅkya āha yat tat bavatām ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- yadyapi kalpanāpoḍhatvena pratyakṣaṃ na siddham,
analyzed: evam manyate yadi api kalpanā apoḍha tvena pratyakṣam na siddham
tathā api artha sākṣātkāri tvena sāmānyam pratyakṣām prasiddham
tatas u pi ucyate pratyakṣam anūdya iti
nanu ca tayoḥ aprasiddha tvāt pratyakṣasya aprasiddhiḥ eva
pratyasya tad svabhāva tvāt
iti āśaṅkayā āha na ca etat mantavyam ityādi su bodham
prāpaka viṣaye upādeyam
na tu ālambana viṣaye
yadi ālambana viṣaye abhrānta tvam abhyupagamyate
yoga ācāra naya nirāsaḥ syāt

original: yogācārā hi sarvamālambanajñānaṃ bhrāntaṃ kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanāpoḍham /
analyzed: yoga ācārāḥ hi sarvam ālambana jñānam bhrāntam kalpanāyāḥ apoḍham apeta kalpanā apoḍham
kalpanā svabhāva rahitam iti arthaḥ
abhrāntam artha kriyā kṣame ca vastu rūpe viparyastam ucyate
artha kriyā kṣamam ca vastu rūpam sanniveśa upādhi varṇa ātmakam
tatra yat na bhrāmyati tat abhrāntām
etat ca lakṣaṇa dvayam vipratipatti nirāsa artham
na tu anumāna nivṛtti artham yatas kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇena eva anumānam vivartitam

original: tatrāsati abhrāntagrahaṇe gaccadvṛkṣadarśanādi pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt syāt /
analyzed: tatra asati abhra anta grahaṇe gaccat vṛkṣa darśana ādi pratyakṣam kalpanā apoḍha tvāt syāt

original: tato hi pravṛttena vṛkṣamātramavāpyate iti saṃvādakatvāt samyagjñānam,
analyzed: tatas hi pravṛttena vṛkṣa mātram avāpyate iti saṃvādaka tvāt samyak jñānam
kalpanā apoḍha tvāt ca pratyakṣam iti syāt āśaṅkā
tad nivṛtti aryam abhra anta grahaṇam
kalpanā svabhāva rahitam iti
bhāva pradhānī nirdeśaḥ
kalpanā tva svabhāva rahitam iri arthaḥ

original: abhrāntamarthakriyākṣame ca vasturūpa ityādināvisaṃvādo 'rtho 'bhrāntaśabdasya na sambhavatīti darśayati /
analyzed: abhrāntam arthakriyā kṣame ca vastu rūpe ityādinā avisaṃvādaḥ rthaḥ bhrānta śabdasya na sambhavati iti darśayati
avisaṃvāda arthe bhrānta śabde gṛhyamāṇe dūṣaṇa pratipādayati

original: sanniveśopādhivarṇātmakamityanenaitad darśayati- varṇādanyat saṃsyānādikaṃ paraparikalpitaṃ nāstīti /
analyzed: sanniveśa upādhi varṇa ātmakam iti anena etat darśayati varṇāt anyat saṃsyāna ādikam para parikalpitam na asti iti

original: etacca lakṣaṇadvayamityādinā padadvayena vipratipattinirāsaṃ darśayatā vinītadevavyakhyā padadvayavyavacedakathanarūpā dūṣitā /
analyzed: etat ca lakṣaṇa dvayam ityādinā pada dvayena vipratipatti nirāsam darśayatā vinīta deva vyakhyā pada dvaya vyavaceda kathana rūpā dūṣitā

original: tena tvevaṃ vyākhyātam- abhrāntamiti yad visaṃvādi na bhavati /
analyzed: tena tu evam vyākhyātam abhrāntam iti yat visaṃvādi na bhavati

original: evaṃ satyanumāsyāpi pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ tannivṛttyartham /
analyzed: evam sati anumā asya api pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam prāpnoti iti kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇam tad nivṛtti artham
yadi evam vyākhyāyate

original: ālambane yanna bhrāntaṃ tadabhrāntam ityevamucyamāne sarva pratyakṣaṃ jñānamālambane bhrāntamiti na kasyacit pratyakṣatvaṃ syāt /
analyzed: ālambane yat na bhrāntam tat abhrāntam iti evam ucyamāne sarva pratyakṣam jñānam ālambane bhrāntam iti na kasyacid pratyakṣa tvam syāt

original: tathā cāha- sarvamālambane bhrāntaṃ muktvā tathāgatajñānam,
analyzed: tathā ca āha sarvam ālambane bhrāntam muktvā tathāgata jñānam
iti yoga ācāra matena tat api atra ācāryeṇa saṃgṛhītam iti tat ayuktam
yatas ācāryeṇa vipratipatti nirāsa artha pada dvayam kṛtam
na vyavacceda artham
atas eva ācāryam anumāpayatā dharmotatreṇa pada dvayam vyākhyām iti

original: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe 'pi kimiti vyavaccedārtha na bhavati?
analyzed: nanu ca bhavataḥ pakṣe kim iti na bhavati
iti āha etat ca ityādi
evam manyate bhrānta śabdaḥ yam na avisaṃvāda arthaḥ gṛhyate

original: api tvarthakriyākṣame vasturūpa ālamabane yanna bhrāmyati tadabhrāntaśabdena gṛhyate /
analyzed: api tu arthakriyā kṣame vastu rūpe ālamabane yat na bhrāmyati tat abhrānta śabdena gṛhyate
nanu ukram yoga ācāra matam asaṃgṛhītam syāt iti
ucyate bāhya nayena sau tāntrika mata anusāreṇa ācāryeṇa lakṣaṇam kṛtam iti adoṣaḥ

original: yogācāramatena tvabhrāntagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamḥ saṃvādakasya samyagjñānasya prastutatvāt /
analyzed: yoga ācāra matena tu abhrānta grahaṇam na kartavyam saṃvādakasya samyak jñānasya prastuta tvāt
anya vyāvartyasya abhavāt
tasmāt abhrānta grahaṇena anumāne niraste kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇam adhikam siddhi vipratipatti nirākaroti
atas eva āha na tu anumāna nivṛtti artham iti
asti ca atra manyante
tatas ca prakaraṇa ārambhaḥ tad naya nirākaraṇa arthaḥ syāt
iṣṭaḥ ca prakaraṇa ārambhaḥ sītrāntika yoga ācāra ubhaya mata anughāvana artham
prāpaka viṣaye visaṃvādaka lakṣaṇam tat di bhrānta tvāt na pratyakṣam
tri rūpa liṅga ja tva abhāvāt ca na anumānam
na ca pramāṇa antaram asti
atas gaccat brikṣa darśana ādi mithyājñānam iti uktam bhavati
yadi mithyājñānam
katham tatas vṛkṣa avāptiḥ
iti ced na tatas vṛkṣa avāptiḥ
nānā deśa gāmī hi vṛkṣaḥ tena pariccinnaḥ
eka deśa niyataḥ ca vṛkṣaḥ vāpyate

original: tato yaddeśo gaccad vṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ taddeśo nāvāpyate /
analyzed: tatas yad deśaḥ gaccat vṛkṣaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ tad deśaḥ na avāpyate

original: yaddeśaścāvāpyate sa na dṛṣṭa iti tasmāt kaścidartho 'vāpyate /
analyzed: yad deśaḥ ca avāpyate sa na dṛṣṭaḥ iti tasmāt kaścid arthaḥ vāpyate
jñāna anantarāt eva tu vṛkṣa ādiḥ arthaḥ vāpyate
iti evam abhrānta grahaṇam vipratipatti nirāsa artham
vipratipattiḥ

original: tathā hi momāṃsakādaya evamāhuḥ yathā nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānaṃ tathā jātyādiyojanājñānamapi samyagjñānamindriyajamḥ upadarśitasyārthasya  #
analyzed: tathā hi momāṃsaka ādayaḥ evam āhuḥ yathā nirvikalpakam jñānam samyak jñānam tathā jāti ādi yojana ajñānam api samyak jñānam indriya jam upadarśitasya arthasya
prāpaṇāt tathā ca āha
tatas param punar vastu dharmaiḥ jāti ādibhiḥ yayā
buddhayā avasīyate sā api pratyakṣa tvena sammatā
tathā ca vaiyākaraṇāḥ āhuḥ
vāc rūpa tā ced utkāmet avabodhasya śāśvatī

original: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamaśinī //
analyzed: na prakāśaḥ prakāśena sā hi pratyavamaśinī

original: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamadṛte /
analyzed: na saḥ sti pratyayaḥ loke yaḥ
anubiddham iva jñāna sarva śabdena bhāsate

original: tathā naiyāyikādīnāṃ savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣamiti kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirākriyate /
analyzed: tathā naiyāyika ādīnām sa vikalpakam pratyakṣam iti kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇena nirākriyate

original: tathā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇena nirvikalpe siddhe 'grahaṇamatiricyamāna dvicandrajñānādeḥsamyagjñānādhikaraṇa eva nirastatvād vipratipattinirāsārthatvameva  #
analyzed: tathā kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇena nirvikalpe siddhe grahaṇam atiricyamāna dvi candra jñāna ādeḥ samyak jñāna adhikaraṇe eva nirasta tvāt vipratipatti nirāsa artha tvam eva
bhavati
tathā ācārya eka deśīya aśukle śaṃkhe pīta jñānam

original: gaccadvṛkṣadarśanajñānaṃ cālātacakrajñānamabhrāntamapi samyagjñānamiccantiḥ vastuno 'bhrāntatvāt pītākārādeśca bhrāntatvāda- ityasti vipratipatti,
analyzed: gaccat vṛkṣa darśana jñānam ca alāta cakra jñānam abhrāntam api samyak jñānam vastunaḥ bhrānta tvāt pīta ākāra ādeḥ ca iti asti
tat nirākriyate brhānta grahaṇena iti sthitam dvayoḥ api vipratipatti nirāsa artha tvam iti

original: tathā sati abhrāntagrahaṇa ityādinābhrāntaviṣayasya vipratipattiviṣayaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: tathā sati abhrānta grahaṇe ityādinā abhrānta viṣayasya vipratipatti viṣayam darśayati
na tatas vṛkṣa avāptiḥ iti upadarśitasya gaccat vṛkṣasya aprāpteḥ iti aniprāyaḥ
jñāna antarāt eva tu ati
pratyakṣa antarāt sthira vṛkṣasya prāpteḥ
bhrānta tvam ca ubhayātumatam eva
evam anumānasya api pratyakṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ
tat api hi avisaṃvādakam abhra antam eva iṣṭam
atas eva anumāna nirāsa artha kalpanā apoḍham iti uktam
tasmāt viśeṣaṇa dvayam ukta prayojanakam
siddhānte prasiddha kalpanā nirastā
iti

original: abhilapyate 'neneti abhilāpaḥ=vācyaḥ tathā abhrāntagrahaṇenāpyanumāne nivartite kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇaṃ vipratipattinirākaraṇārtham /
analyzed: abhilapyate nena iti abhilāpaḥ vācyaḥ tathā abhrānta grahaṇena api anumāne nivartite kalpanā apoḍha grahaṇam vipratipatti nirākaraṇa artham
bhrāntam hi anumānam sva pratibhāse anartha dhyavasāyena pravṛtta tvāt

original: pratyakṣaṃ tu grāhya rūpe na viparyastam /
analyzed: pratyakṣam tu grāhya rūpe na viparyastam

original: na tvavisaṃvādakamabhrāntimiha grahītavyam yataḥ samyagjñānameva pratyakṣam, nānyat /
analyzed: na tu avisaṃvādakam abhrāntim iha grahītavyam yatas samyak jñānam eva pratyakṣam na anyat
tatra samyak jñāna tvāt eva avisaṃvādaka tve labdhe punar avisaṃvādaka grahaṇam niṣprayojanam eva

original: evaṃ hi vākyārthaḥ syāt- pratyakṣākhyaṃ yadavisaṃvādakaṃ jñānaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhamavisaṃvādakaṃ ceti /
analyzed: evam hi vākya arthaḥ syāt pratyakṣa ākhyam yat avisaṃvādakam jñānam tat kalpanā apoḍham avisaṃvādakam ca iti
na ca nena dvis avisaṃvādaka grahaṇena kiñcid

original: tasmād grāhya'rthakriyākṣame vasturūpe yadaviparyastaṃ tadabhrāntamiha veditavyam / // 4 //
analyzed: tasmāt grāhi artha kriyā kṣame vastu rūpe yat aviparyastam tat abhrāntam iha veditavyam
kīdṛśī panaḥ kalpanā iha gṛhyate
iti āha abhilāpa ityādi
abhilapyate nena iti abhilāpaḥ
vācakaḥ śabdaḥ

original: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpasaṃsargaḥ= ekasmin jñāne 'bhidheyākārasyābhidhānākāreṇa saha ghrāhyākāratayā milanam /
analyzed: abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ abhilāpa saṃsargaḥ ekasmin jñāne bhidheya ākārasya abhidhāna ākāreṇa saha ghrāhya ākāra tayā milanam

original: tato yadaikasmin jñāne 'bhidheyābhidhānayorākārau sanniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā tathā bhrāntagrahaṇenetyādinā kalpanāpoḍhagrahaṇadya vipratipattinirāsārthatvaṃ  #
analyzed: tatas yadā ekasmin jñāne bhidheya abhidhānayoḥ ākārau sanniviṣṭau bhavataḥ tadā tathā bhrānta grahaṇena ityādinā vipratipatti nirāsa artha tvam
darśayati
vipratipatti viṣayaḥ ca ṭīkākṛtā na darśitaḥ ati prasiddha tvāt
yat uktam bhrānta arthaḥ iti

original: tasyārthasma grahaṇe doṣaṃ darśayati- na tvavisaṃvādakamityādinā // 4 //
analyzed: grahaṇe doṣam darśayati na tu avisaṃvādakam ityādinā

original: kīdṛśī punaḥ kalpanetyādinā kalpanābahutvāt kasyāḥ kalpanāyā grahaṇamiti kalpanāviśeṣamajānan pṛccati /
analyzed: kīdṛśī punar kalpanā ityādinā kalpanā bahutvāt kasyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ grahaṇam iti kalpanā viśeṣam a jānan pṛccati

original: tathā hi- vaibhāṣikā indriyavijñānaṃ vitarka vicāra caitasikasamprayuktaṃ kalpanāmiccanti /
analyzed: tathā hi vaibhāṣikāḥ indriya vijñānam kalpanām iccanti

original: yogācāramatena ca tathāgatajñānamadvayaṃ muktvā sarvajñānaṃ grahyagrāhakatvena vikalpitaṃ kalpanā /
analyzed: yoga ācāra matena ca tathāgata jñānam advayam muktvā sarva jñānam grahya grāhaka tvena vikalpitam kalpanā
jāti ādi saṃsṛṣṭam tu manaḥ jñānam kalpanā iti anye kathayanti

original: abhilāpetyādinā śabdasaṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇaṃ nāgamaparipaṭhitānāmiti darśayati /
analyzed: abhilāpa ityādinā śabda saṃsṛṣṭasya vikalpasya grahaṇam na āgama paripaṭhitānām iti darśayati
teṣām grahaṇe sati indriya vijñānasya pratyakṣa tva anupapatteḥ
abhilapyate nena iti karaṇa sādhanena etat darśayati vācakaḥ abhilāpa śabdena iṣṭhaḥ
na tu vācyam śabda sāmānya rūpaḥ
abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ iti abhilāpa saṃsargaḥ
saṃsargaḥ tu sambandhaḥ
abhilāpa saṃsargasya yogyam iti abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam
artha sāmānyam

original: tadeva hi anvayavyatirekavattvād vyāptatvād abhilāpayituṃ śakyam /
analyzed: tat eva hi anvaya vyatirekavat tvāt vyāpta tvāt abhilāpayitum śakyam
artha viśeṣaḥ sva lakṣaṇa rūpaḥ tu saṃsṛṣṭe abhidhāna abhidheye bhavataḥ

original: abhilāpasaṃsargasya yogyo 'bhidheyākārābhāso yasyāṃ pratītau sā tathoktā /
analyzed: abhilāpa saṃsargasya yogyaḥ bhidheya ākāra ābhāsaḥ yasyām pratītau sā tathā uktā
tatra kācid pratītiḥ abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭa ābhāsā bhavati

original: yathā- vyutpanna saṃketasya ghaṭārthakalpanā ghaṭaśabdasaṃsṛṣṭārthāvabhāsā bhavati /
analyzed: yathā vyutpanna saṃketasya ghaṭa artha kalpanā ghaṭa śabda saṃsṛṣṭa artha avabhāsā bhavati

original: kācittu abhilāpenāsaṃsṛṣṭāpi abhilāpasaṃsargayogyābhāsā bhavatiḥ yathā- bālakasyāvyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā /
analyzed: kācid tu abhilāpena asaṃsṛṣṭā api abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya ābhāsā bhavatiḥ yathā bālakasya avyutpanna saṃketasya kalpanā

original: tatra abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā kalpanā ityuktāvavyutpannasaṃketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta /
analyzed: tatra abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭa ābhāsā kalpanā iti uktau avyutpanna saṃketasya kalpanā na saṃgṛhyeta
yogya grahaṇe tu sā api saṃgṛhyate

original: yadayapi abhilāpasaṃsṛṣṭābhāsā na bhavati tadaharjātasya bālakasya kalpanā,
analyzed: abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭa ābhāsā na bhavati tad ahar jātasya bālakasya kalpanā
abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsā tu bhavati eva
yā ca abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭā sā api yogyā
tatas ubhayoḥ api yogya grahaṇena saṃgrahaḥ

original: sāmānyadi tena vinītadevavyākhyā dūṣitā- abhilapyata ityabhilāpaḥ= vācyaḥ sāmānyādiḥ ityevaṃrūpā /
analyzed: tena vinīta deva vyākhyā dūṣitā abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ vācyaḥ sāmānya ādiḥ iti evaṃrūpā
evam eva atra āśrayaṇīyam

original: anyathā yogyagrahaṇena śabdasaṃsargayogyo na kathitaḥ syāditi /
analyzed: anyathā yogya grahaṇena śabda saṃsarga yogyaḥ na kathitaḥ syāt iti

original: yadayevam, dharmottaravyākhyāne jātyādervācakasya saṃsargabhāvo na pradarśitaḥ syāt?
analyzed: dharma uttara vyākhyāne jāti ādeḥ vācakasya saṃsarga bhāvaḥ na pradarśitaḥ syāt
satyam anena na pratipāditaḥ

original: viṣayacintāyāṃ sāmānyādeviṣayabhāvakathanena sāmarthyāt kathitaṃ bhavatīti nirodhaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya cintāyām sāmānya ādi viṣaya bhāva kathanena sāmarthyāt kathitam bhavati iti nirodhaḥ
ekasmin jñāne

original: nanu ca yadayapi tasmin jñāne ākārayormīlanaṃ tathapi śabdārthayoḥ saṃsargo nāsti?
analyzed: nanu ca tasmin jñāne ākārayoḥ mīlanam śabda arthayoḥ saṃsargaḥ na asti
iti āha tatas yadā ekasmin ityādi
śabda arthayoḥ sa sarga vijñāne pi tayoḥ ākārayoḥ mīlanam na sambhavati iti abhirpāyaḥ

original: tatra kācit pratītirityādinā yogyagrahaṇasya viṣayaṃ darśayati /
analyzed: tatra kācid pratītiḥ ityādinā yogya grahaṇasya viṣayam darśayati
vyutpanna saṃketa apakṣayā ākāra dvaya pratibhāsanam

original: nanu cāvyutpannasaṃketasya bālamūkāderanumato vijñāne na śabdasaṃsarga iti tadayogyatvamapi nāsti /
analyzed: nanu ca avyutpanna saṃketasya bāla mūka ādeḥ anumataḥ vijñāne na śabda saṃsargaḥ iti tad ayogya tvam api nā asti
kaḥ ca saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsaḥ
yaḥ śabda pratibhāsaḥ

original: mūkādijñāne tu saṃketābhāve sati śabdaratibhāso 'pi na sambhavatīti sasargayogyatvamapi nāsti /
analyzed: mūka ādi jñāne tu saṃketa abhāve sati na sambhavati iti sasarga yogya tvam api nā asti
kim idam yogya tvam nāma
abhidheya ākārasya saṃketa karaṇa yogya tvam
na ca abhighāna ullekhā abhāve sati abhidheya pratibhāsam
nā api yogya tvam iti
tathā ca kumārilaḥ prāha
asti hi ālocanā jñānam prathamam nirvikalpakam
śuddha vastu jam
abhilāpayitum na tad vayāpta tvāt
jñāne abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyaḥ yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ saḥ eva abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsaḥ
artha sāmānyasya artha ākāraḥ iti śeṣaḥ

original: yadvā- na abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ= abhidherya yadarthasāmānyam /
analyzed: yat vā na abhilapyate iti abhilāpaḥ yat artha sāmānyam
abhilāpena saṃsargaḥ iti abhilāpa saṃsargaḥ
abhilāpa saṃsargasya yogyam iti abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam
śabda sāmānyam
anvaya vyatireka vaśāt tena artha abhidhānam śakyam
śabda viśeṣeṇa tu na śakyam tasya a sāmāna tvāt

original: jñāne 'bhilāpasaṃsargayogyo yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ sa evābhilāpa asatyabhilāpasaṃsarge kuto yogyatāvasitiḥ?
analyzed: jñāne bhilāpa saṃsarga yogyaḥ yaḥ pratibhāsaḥ saḥ eva abhilāpa asati abhilāpa saṃsarge kutas yogya tā avasitiḥ
iti ced aniyata pratibhāsa tvāt
aniyata pratibhāsa tvam ca pratibhāsa niyama hetoḥ abhāvāt

original: grahyo hyartho vijñānaṃ janayan niyatapratibhāsaṃ kuryāt /
analyzed: grahyaḥ hi arthaḥ vijñānam janayan niyata pratibhāsam kuryāt
yathā rūpam cakṣuḥ vijñānam janayat niyata pratibhāsam janayati
vikalpa vijñānam tu arthāt na utpadayate
tatas pratibhāsa niyama hetoḥ abhāvāt aniyata pratibhāsam
kutas punar etat vikalpaḥ ṛthāt na utpadayate iti
artha sannidhi nirapekṣa tvāt

original: bālo 'pi hi yāvad dṛśyamānaṃ stanaṃ sa evāyam iti pūrvaduṣṭatvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvannoparatarudito mukhamarpayati stane /
analyzed: bālaḥ hi yāvat dṛśyamānam stanam saḥ eva ayam iti pūrva duṣṭa tvena na pratyavamṛśati tāvat na uparata ruditaḥ mukham arpayati stane
pūrva dṛṣṭa apara dṛṣṭam ca artham ekīkurvat a vijñānam asannihita viṣayam
pūrva dṛṣṭasya asannihita tvāt
a sanninahita viṣayam ca artha nirapekṣam
anapekṣam ca pratibhāsa niyama hetoḥ abhāvāt aniyata pratibhāsam
tādṛśam ca abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam

original: tataśca vyāavarttyābhavāda yogyagrahaṇaṃ na kartavyamityāśaṅkāṃ parasya darśayati asatyabhilāpetyādinā /
analyzed: tatas ca yogya grahaṇam na kartavyam iti āśaṅkām parasya darśayati asat abhilāpa ityādinā
aniyata pratibhāsa ityādinā uttaram āha
evam manyate śabda saṃsargi tvam kim ucyate
vikalpa jñānasya aniyata bhasa tvam eva
kutas tat siddham
iti āha aniyata ityādi
arthāt eva hi utpadayamānam niyata pratibhāsam bhavati
tathā cakṣuḥ vijñānam iti abhiprāyaḥ
nanu kalpanā jñānam api arthāt utpadayamānam bhaviṣyati
iti āha vikalpa vijñānam ityādi
artha sannidhi vinā vikalpa jñānasya utpattiḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ
tena indriya jñānam eva niyata pratibhāsam
vikalpa jñānam tu aniyata pratibhāsam iti

original: tathā niyatapratibhāsaṃ vikalpajñānaṃ bālamūkāderapyastīti darśayati- bālo 'pi hītyādinā /
analyzed: tathā niyata pratibhāsam vikalpa jñānam bāla mūka ādeḥ api asti iti darśayati hi ityādinā

original: nanu ca bālasya tālvādikaraṇapāṭavābhāve sāmānyaviśeṣaśabdoccāraṇaṃ nāsti,
analyzed: nanu ca bālasya tālu ādi karaṇa pāṭava abhāve sāmānya viśeṣa śabda uccāraṇam na asti
tat kim ucyate saḥ eva ayam iti

original: satyaṃ nāstiḥ kintu sa evāyam ityenena vikalpasyāvasthocyate /
analyzed: satyam nāstiḥ kintu saḥ eva ayam iti enena vikalpasya avasthā ucyate
saḥ eva ayam iti anena pūrva dṛṣṭa tvam eva ucyate
uparata ruditaḥ apagata ruditaḥ

original: etad darśayati- bālasyāpi pūrvaparaparāmarśarūpaṃ vikalpakaṃ vijñānamasti,
analyzed: etat darśayati bālasya api pūrva para parāmarśa rūpam vikalpakam vijñānam asti
niyata viṣaye pravṛtteḥ
yathā gṛhīta saṃketasya pūrva apara parāmaśena pravṛtiḥ iti
yat ca pūrva apara parāmarśa tat aniyata pratibhāsam pūrva aparayoḥ ā saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsaḥ
śabda sāmānya ākāraḥ iti śeṣaḥ iti etat uktam bhavati

original: evaṃ śleṣeṇa vākyasya vyākhyānena ubhayorapi tadvikalpākāraḥ abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsa ityuktaṃ veditavyam /
analyzed: evam śleṣeṇa vākyasya vyākhyānena ubhayoḥ api tad vikalpa ākāraḥ abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsaḥ iti uktam veditavyam
indriya vijñānam tu sannihita artha mātra grāhi tvāt artha sāpekṣam
arthasya ca pratibhāsa niyama hetu tvāt niyata pratibhāsam
tatas na abhilāpa saṃsarga yogyam
atas eva vācya vācaka bhāvam abhyupgamya etat avikalpaka tvam ucyate

original: yadayapi hi svalakṣaṇameva vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca bhavet,
analyzed: hi sva lakṣaṇam eva vācyam vācakam ca bhavet
tathā api abhilāpa saṃsṛṣṭa artha vijñānam sa vikalpakam

original: na cendriyavijñānam arthena niyamitapratibhāsatvāt abhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ bhavatīti nirvikalpakam /
analyzed: na ca indriya vijñānam arthena niyamita pratibhāsa tvāt abhilāpa saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam bhavati iti nirvikalpakam
śrotra vijñānam tarhi śabda sva lakṣaṇa grāhi

original: śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ ca kiñcit vācyaṃ kiñcid vācakam- ityabhilākasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ syāt,
analyzed: śabda sva lakṣaṇam ca kiñcid vācyam kiñcid vācakam iti abhilāka saṃsarga yogya pratibhāsam syāt
tathā ca sa vikalpakam syāt

original: ropitatvāditi saṃsagaṃyogyaṃ bālamūkādervijñānamiti tannivṛttyarthaṃ yogyagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti sthitam /
analyzed: ropita tvāt iti bāla mūka ādeḥ vijñānam iti tad nivṛtti artham yogya grahaṇam kartavyam iti sthitam

original: indriyavijñānamityādinā kumarilena yadindriyavijñānasyālocanākhyasya bālamūkādivijñānena sādṛśyaṃ pratipāditam,
analyzed: indriya vijñānam ityādinā kumarilena yat indriya vijñānasya ālocanā ākhyasya bāla mūka ādi vijñānena sādṛśyam pratipāditam

original: tad dūṣayitumukasṃhāravyājena vailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati ata evetvādi /
analyzed: tat dūṣayitumuka sṃhāra vyājena vailakṣaṇyam darśayati atas eva itvādi
yat indriya vijñānam artha balena utpadayamānam niyata pratibhāsam tat nirvikalpasam

original: ata eva svalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdasyārthasya ca vācya vācakatvamamyupagamya nirvikalpakatvamindriyavijñānasya sādhyate /
analyzed: atas eva sva lakṣaṇasya api śabdasya arthasya ca vācya vācaka tvam amyupagamya nirvikalpaka tvam indriya vijñānasya sādhyate

original: vikalpavijñānasya tu svalakṣaṇavācya vācakatvaṃ pratibhāsino 'pi savikalpakatvamiti sthitam /
analyzed: vikalpa vijñānasya tu sva lakṣaṇa vācya vācaka tvam sa vikalpaka tvam iti sthitam
sva lakṣaṇayoḥ vācya vācaka bhāva abhyupagamam darśayati
paramārthataḥ sāmānyayoḥ eva vācya vācaka tvam na artha śabda viśeṣasya ityādinā nyānena
avaśyam ca sva lakṣaṇayoḥ vācya vācaka bhavaḥ bhyupagamya

original: kutaḥ? sāmānyayorviṣayacintāyāmeva nirasyamānatvāditi nirvikalpakatvakathanaṃ vyartha syādiha /
analyzed: kutas sāmānyayoḥ viṣaya cintāyām eva nirasyamāna tvāt iti nirvikalpaka tva kathanam vyartha syāt iha
tat api hi viṣaya aviṣaya cintā dvāreṇa nirvikalpaka viṣayam eva iti

original: tena yad vinītadevena sāmānyayorvācyavācakabhāvamaṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpakatvamindriyāvijñānasya pratipāditam,
analyzed: tena yat vinītadevena sāmānyayoḥ vācya vācaka bhāvam aṅgīkṛtya nirvikalpaka tvam indriya avijñānasya pratipāditam
tat dūṣitam bhaṅgayā
śrotra vijñānam tahi ityādinā sva lakṣaṇasya vācya vācaka bhāva pakṣe tiprasaṅgam āpādayati paraḥ
kiñcid nirvikalpaka tvam indriya vijñānasya sādhanīyam
na sāmānyayoḥ vācya vācaka bhāvam abhyupagamya śabda sva lakṣaṇam vācyam
yadā ghaṭa śabdaḥ
śabda śabdaḥ vā śabdam śabdena pratipadayate

original: tadā kiñcid vācyaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇaṃ kiñcid vācakaṃ śabdasvalakṣaṇa
analyzed: tadā kiñcid vācyam śabda sva lakṣaṇam kiñcid vācakam śabda sva lakṣaṇa
tayā rahitam timira āśu bhramaṇa nau yāna saṃkṣobha ādi an āhita vibhramam jñānam pratyakṣam
pratītiḥ iti saṃvidanam
buddhaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tayā rahitam iti kalpanayā rahitam
kalpanā kaluṣeṇa rahitam iti śeṣaḥ

original: tena etaduktyā śabdārthasāmānyākārarahitāyā pratītiḥ sā eva pratītiḥ,
analyzed: tena etad uktyā pratītiḥ sā eva pratītiḥ
sā eva pratyakṣa pramāṇam iti uktam bhavati
timira āśu bhramaṇa nau yāna saṃkṣobha ādi an āhita vibhramam iti
atra timiram iti akṣi pīḍā
āśu bhramaṇam iti alāta cakra ādi
nauyānam iti nāvā yānam
saṃkṣoma na eṣa doṣaḥ

original: satyapi svalakṣaṇasya vācyavācakabhāve saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena gṛhyamāṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vācyaṃ vācakaṃ ca gṛhītaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sati api sva lakṣaṇasya vācya vācaka bhāve saṃketa kāla dṛṣṭa tvena gṛhyamāṇam sva lakṣaṇam vācyam vācakam ca gṛhītam syāt

original: na ca saṃketakālabhāvi darśanaviṣayatvaṃ vastunaḥ saṃpratyamti /
analyzed: na ca saṃketa kāla bhāvi darśana viṣaya tvam vastunaḥ saṃprati amti
yathā hi saṃketa kāla bhāvi darśanam adya niruddham
tadvat tad viṣaya tvam api arthasya adya nā asti
tatas pūrva kāla ddaṣṭa tvam apaśyat crotra jñānam ca vācya vācaka bhāva grāhi
anena eva nyānena yogi jñānam api sakala śabda artha avabhāsi tve pi saṃketa kāla dṛṣṭa tva agrahaṇaṇāt nirvikalpakam

original: tayeti / tayā kalpanayā kalpanāsvabhāvena rahitaṃ śūnyaṃ sahjñānaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: tayā iti tayā kalpanayā kalpanā svabhāvena rahitam śūnyam sah jñānam yat abhrāntam tat pratyakṣam iti pareṇa sambandhaḥ
kalpanā apoḍha tva abhrānta tve paraspara sāpekṣe m iti

original: tataḥ śuddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabdavijñāne dvayorapi śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanāccotrendriyajñānamaniyatapratibhāsitvāt savikalpakaṃ syādityākūtam
analyzed: tatas śuddhayoḥ śravaṇe sati śabda vijñāne dvayoḥ api śabdayoḥ pratibhāsanāt cotra indriya jñānam aniyata pratibhāsi tvāt savikalpakam syāt iti ākūtam
sati api ityādi
evam manyate yadi api sva lakṣaṇayoḥ vācya vācaka tvam

original: tathāpi śrotravijñāne na vācyavācakatayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanam,
analyzed: tathā api śrotra vijñāne na vācya vācaka tayā tayoḥ pratibhāsanam
api tu śuddhayoḥ eva pratibhāsanam
yasmāt śabda sannidhi balena śrotra vijñānam utpadyate
na ca sannihitayoḥ śabdayoḥ vācya vācaka tvam asti
yāvat saṃketa kāla bhāvi śabda smaraṇam na bhavati

original: tāvat kuto vācyatvaṃ vācakatvaṃ vā syāt,
analyzed: tāvat kutas vācya tvam vācaka tvam vā syāt

original: etatpratyabhijñayā sa evāyaṃ vācako bhaviṣyatotyāha na ca saṃketakāletyādi /
analyzed: etad pratyabhijñayā saḥ eva ayam vācakaḥ bhaviṣyatā iti āha na ca saṃketa kāla ityādi
viṣaya bhedāt tayoḥ pūrva uttarayoḥ bhedaḥ
kaḥ ca saṃketa viṣayaḥ śabdaḥ
yaḥ saṃketa kāla bhāvinā jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ

original: yaśca pūrva jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ sa idānī nāsti,
analyzed: yaḥ ca pūrva jñānena viṣayīkṛtaḥ saḥ idānī na asti
pūrva jñāna vināśe pūrva jñāna viṣaya tvasya abhāvāt
atas pūrva kāla viṣaya tvam apaśyat sannihite śrotra valena utpadyamānām nirvikalpakam eva

original: yogijñānena yadyekasmin kāle manovijñānena ca yugapaccabdāthau gṛhyate,
analyzed: yogi jñānena yadi ekasmin kāle manaḥ vijñānena ca yugapad cabda athau gṛhyate

original: tathāpi sannihitavastutayā tena gṛhītavyāviti darśayati- yogijñānamityādinā // /5 //
analyzed: tathā api sannihita vastu tayā tena gṛhītavyau iti darśayati yogi jñānam ityādinā
nanu kalpanā jñānam api parayā kalpanayā śūnyam
tatas ca tasya api nirvikalpaka tvam prāpnoti
iti āśaṅkayā āha tathā kalpanayā kalpanā svabhāvena ityādi
evam iti vāta pitta kapha prakopeṇa dhātu khedaḥ

original: timiraṃ ca āśubhramaṇaṃ ca nauyānaṃ ca saṃkṣobhaśceti te ādayo yeṣāṃ te timirāśubhramaṇanauyānasaṃkṣobhādayaḥ /
analyzed: timiram ca āśu bhramaṇam ca nauyānam ca saṃkṣobhaḥ ca iti te ādayaḥ yeṣām te timira āśu bhramaṇa nauyāna saṃkṣobha ādayaḥ
ādi śabdena naṣṭadṛṣṭi pītadṛṣṭayā ādīnām saṃgrahaḥ
āhitaḥ vibhrabhaḥ yasmiṃmaḥ tat āhitavibhramam
na āhita vibhramam iti anāhita vibhramam
timira āśu bhramaṇa nau yāna saṃkṣobhaiḥ an āhita vibhramam iti timira āśu bhramaṇa nau yāna saṃkṣobha an āhita vibhramam
tathā ca timira rogeṇa dvi candra darśanam bhavati
nauyāna gatyā tora taruḥ calan dṛśyate
vāta pitta ādi kopena vastu jvalita ādikam dṛśyate
pratyakṣa lakṣaṇam

original: na pratyekam- iti darśayituṃ tayā rahitaṃ yadabhrāntaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti lakṣaṇayoḥ parasparasāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ darśitamiti /
analyzed: na pratyekam iti darśayitum tayā rahitam yat abhrāntam tat pratyakṣam iti lakṣaṇayoḥ paraspara sāpekṣayoḥ pratyakṣa viṣaya tvam darśitam iti
timiram asṇoḥ viplavaḥ
indriya gatam idam vibhrama kāraṇam
āśu bhramaṇam alāta ādeḥ
mandam hi bhramyamāṇe lāta ādau a cakra bhrāntiḥ utpadyate
tad artham āśu grahaṇena viśeṣyate bhramaṇam
etat ca viṣaya gatam vibhrama kāraṇam
nāvā gamanam nauyānam

original: gaccantyāṃ nāvi sthitasya gaccadvṛkṣādibhrāntirutpadyate iti yaunagrahaṇam /
analyzed: gaccantyām nāvi sthitasya gaccat vṛkṣa ādi bhrāntiḥ utpadyate iti yauna grahaṇam
etat ca bāhya āśraya sthitam vibhrama kāraṇam
saṃkṣā ābhaḥ vāta pitta śleṣmaṇām
vāta ādiṣu hi jvalita stambhā vibhrāntiḥ utpadyate
etat ca adhyātma gatam vibhrama kāraṇam

original: sarvareva ca vibhramakāraṇairindriyaviṣayabāhyādhyātmikāśrayagatairindriya- manyate-dharmiṇā kalpanājñānena dharmo 'tra kalpanātvaṃ lakṣyate
analyzed: ca vibhrama kāraṇaiḥ indriya viṣaya bāhya ādhyātmika āśraya gataiḥ indriya manyate dharmiṇā kalpanā jñānena kalpanā tvam lakṣyate

original: yathā viṣāṇītyava viṣāṇitvamḥ tataśca kalpanātvena rahitaṃ yajjñānaṃ tannirvikalpakam /
analyzed: yathā viṣāṇi iti ava viṣāṇi tvam tatas ca kalpanā tvena rahitam yat jñānam tat nirvikalpakam
na ca kalpanā jñānam kalpanā tva rahitam iti adoṣaḥ
parasparam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya tvam

original: na svātantryeṇa pṛthaglakṣaṇatvamiti darśayitumante pratyakṣaśabdaṃ gṛhītvā tayorapi sambadhnāti-tatpratyakṣamiti pareṇa sambandha ityanena
