anantara śabdaḥ ca samāna jātīya para tena asamāna jātīya viṣaya grahaṇa prasaṅgaḥ vā

original: kutaḥ? indriyavijñānena samanantarapratyayena janitamityukterandhavadhirādayabhavayadā cidnriyavijñānaviṣayopādeyabhūtaḥ kṣaṇo gṛhītaḥ,
analyzed: kutas indriya vijñānena samanantara pratyayena janitam iti ukteḥ andha vadhiḥ ādaya bhava yadā cit nriya vijñāna viṣaya upādeya bhūtaḥ kṣaṇaḥ gṛhītaḥ
tadā indriya jñānena agṛhītasya viṣaya antarasya grahaṇāt andha vadhiḥ ādaya bhāva doṣa prasaṅgaḥ nirastaḥ
etat ca manaḥ vijñānam uparata vyāpāre cakṣuṣi pratyakṣam iṣyate

original: cyapāravati tu cakṣuṣi yad rūpajñānaṃ tat sarva cakṣuraśritamevaḥ itarathā cakṣurāśritatvānu papattiḥ kasyacidapi vijñānasya /
analyzed: tu cakṣuṣi yat rūpa jñānam tat sarva cakṣuḥ āśritam eva itarathā cakṣuḥ āśrita tva anu papattiḥ kasyacid api vijñānasya
etat ca siddhānta prasiddham mānasam pratyakṣam
na tu asya prasādhakam asti pramāṇam

original: evañjātīyakaṃ tad yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syād- iti vaktuṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātamasyeti // 9 //
analyzed: evañjātīyakam tat yadi syāt na kaścid doṣaḥ syāt iti vaktum lakṣaṇam ākhyātam asya iti
etat ca ityādinā manaḥ vijñanasya utpatti viṣayam darśayati
uparute cakṣuṣā auti

original: yadā cakṣuviṣayamālocyoparataṃ bhavati tadālocanāviṣaye cakṣurvijñānamutpannaṃ sat punadvitīye kṣaṇa ātmīyaviṣayānantaraviṣaye notpadayateḥ  #
analyzed: yadā cakṣu viṣayam ālocya uparatam bhavati tadā ālocanā viṣaye cakṣuḥ vijñānam utpannam sat punar dvitīye kṣaṇe ātmīya viṣaya anantara viṣaye
indriyāṇām tatra vyāpāra abhāvāt

original: tataśca tenendriyavijñānena svaviṣayānantaraviṣayasahakāriṇā pratyakṣamutpadayate iti sthitam /
analyzed: tatas ca tena indriya vijñānena sva viṣaya anantara viṣaya sahakāriṇā pratyakṣam utpadayate iti sthitam

original: nanvekasmin kṣaṇe tasyotpadake sati na tatra kācidarthakriyāvāpyate- iti puruṣārthānupayogitvāt prāmāṇyaṃ prāpnoti?
analyzed: nanu ekasmin kṣaṇe tasya utpadake sati na tatra kācid arthakriyā avāpyate iti puruṣa artha anupayogi tvāt prāmāṇyam prāpnoti
na mānasa pratyakṣeṇa asmad vighānām artha kriyā avāptiḥ bhavati
api tu yoginaḥ vīta rāga ādeḥ

original: te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase copadarśitaṃ viṣayaṃ pratipadaya dharmadeśanādikamarthakriyāmāsādayantītyanavadayam /
analyzed: te ca tasmin kṣaṇe mānase ca upadarśitam viṣayam dharma deśanā ādikam arthakriyām āsādayanti iti anavadayam
atha vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi kim iti mānasa utpatti lupyate
iti āha vyāpāravatī ityādi
sarva indriya āśritam jñānam cakṣuḥ vijñānam eva
na mānasasya upattiḥ asti iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇa indriyavijñānaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: nanu vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi prathame kṣaṇe indriya vijñānam bhavati
dvitīye kṣaṇe mānasam bhavati
samāna jātīyayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ na asti
iti āha itarathā ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kimitīndriyavijñānaṃ notpadayate,
analyzed: evam manyate vyāāravati cakṣuṣi kim iti indriya vijñānam na utpadayate
dvitīye kṣaṇe yogya karaṇe sati samāna rūpam
tena tayoḥ katham indriya vijñāna vyapdeśaḥ na syāt iti

original: nanu ca yadi mānasaṃ pratyakṣamindriyavijñānād bhitre pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddhaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: nanu ca yadi mānasam pratyakṣam indriya vijñānāt bhitre pratyakṣa ādi pramāṇa siddham bhavet

original: tadā tasya lakṣaṇaṃ yāvatā pramāṇasiddhameva nāsti?
analyzed: tadā tasya lakṣaṇam yāvatā pramāṇa siddham eva na asti
iti ahar etat ca ityādi
evañjātīyakam iti
indriya vijñāna sadṛśam

original: tadetad dharmottareṇāgamasiddhaṃ darśayatāmācāryajñānagarbhaprabhṛtīnāṃ mānasasiddhaye yat pramāṇamupanyastam vikalpodayāt iti,
analyzed: tat etat dharmottareṇa āgama siddham darśayatām ācārya jñānagarbha prabhṛtīnām mānasa siddhaye yat pramāṇam upanyastam vikalpa udayāt iti
tat bhaṅgayā avadhāraṇāt eva dūṣitam
teḥ evam vyakhyātam vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi indriya jñānam tpadayate
mānasam ca na śakyate
sarva citta caittānām ātma saṃvedanān
prasaṅga doṣaḥ nirastaḥ
andha vadhiḥ ayaḥ manaḥ vijñāne samanantara pratyayaḥ indriya vijñānam na asti
tena yat āhuḥ kecid manaḥ vijñānena bāhya aviṣaya pratyakṣam aṅgīkriyate
evam andha babira ādi yabhāva prasaṅgaḥ iti
tad vacanam apāstam veditavyam  /
sarva citta caitānām ātma saṃvedanam iti
sarve ca te cittacaitāḥ ca iti sarva citacaittāḥ
sva saṃvedanam ākhyātum āha sarva citta ityādi
cittam artha mātra grāhi
caittāḥ viśeṣa avasthā grāhiṇaḥ sukha ādayaḥ

original: sarve ca te cittcaittāśca sarvacitta vaktum- dvayoyugapadutpattirnāstītiḥ yataḥ samānendriyayornāsti,
analyzed: sarve ca te citta caittāḥ ca sarva citta vaktum dvayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ na asti iti yatas samāna indriyayoḥ na asti
na bhinna indriyayoḥ
ṣaṇṇā yugapad utpattiḥ iti vacanāt
tatas ca dvayoḥ bhinna indriyayoḥ yugapad utpattiḥ

original: na ca tatra bhedenānupalabhyamānaṃ mānasa nāstīti śakyate vaktumḥ samānajātīyanīlavikalpīdayāt /
analyzed: na ca tatra bhedena anupalabhyamānam mānasa na asti iti śakyate vaktum samāna jātīya nīla vikalpī dayāt
yadi ca tat na mānasam syāt
tad pṛṣṭha bhāvī nīla vikalpaḥ na syāt eva
samānāt hi mānasa ātmanaḥ vikalpasya utpattiḥ bhavati
na vijātīyāt indriya vijñānāt iti

original: yathā- devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīlaniścayo bhavati,
analyzed: yathā devadattena nīle gṛhīte na yajñadattasya nīla niścayaḥ bhavati
tathā indriya vijñāna santanayaḥ bhinna tvāt
na thā mānasa manaḥ vikalpa santānayoḥ bhinna santāna tvam dvayoḥ api anindriya tvāt
manaḥ vyapadeśāt ca iti
atrā ucyate yat uktam tāvat samāna jātīya vikalpa udayāt iti
tad saddhau yat sādhanam tat anekāntikam vijātīyāt api utpatti darśanāt anvaya vyatirekābhyām
na ca vyāpāravati cakṣuṣi mānasasya utpattiḥ asti
na ca dvayoḥ nīla vijñānayoḥ utpattiḥ nirvikalpakayoḥ dṛśyate
an upalabhyamāna tvāt tayoḥ

original: tenendriyavijñānādeva vijātīyād vikalpakasyotpattenaṃ dikalpasyodayāditi mānasasiddhau hetuḥ /
analyzed: tena indriya vijñānāt eva vijātīyāt vikalpakasya utpattenam dikalpasya udayāt iti mānasa siddhau hetuḥ
na ca devadatta yajñadattayoḥ iva bhinna santāna varti tvam savikalpaka nirvikalpakayoḥ
yena bhinna santānāt nirvikalpakāt syāt
eka santāna pāti tvāt tayoḥ
avaśyam ca aṅgīkartavyā vikalpasya utpattiḥ
yena vārttikakāraḥ evam āha
tat dṛṣṭau eva dṛṣṭeṣu saṃvid sāmarthya bhāvinaḥ
sva vyāpāra tva karaṇāt smaraṇāt ityādi
savit cabdena indriya vijñānam eva ucyate na mānasam
tatas ca tad sāmarthya bhavi katham vikalpa vijñānam smaraṇam
vijātīya tvāt

original: na ca tatra mānasaṃ saṃviducyate indriyavijñānasya vyavahāreṇa,
analyzed: na ca tatra mānasam saṃvid ucyate indriya vijñānasya vyavahāreṇa

original: prāmāṇyasya cintyatvāt kiñca indriyavijñānasya kathaṃ prāmānyam,
analyzed: prāmāṇyasya cintya tvāt kiñca indriya vijñānasya katham prāmānyam
yadi sva vyāpāram karoti
sva vyāpāraḥ tu sva viṣaye vikalpa janaka tvam nāma
tatas ca vijātīyāt api vikalpasya udayāt iti yat kiñcid etat

original: nanu cittacaitā iti vaktavye sarvagrahaṇasya vyāvartyābhāvādapārthakaṃ tadgrahaṇam?
analyzed: nanu citta caitāḥ iti vaktavye sarva grahaṇasya vyāvartya abhāvāt apārthakam tad grahaṇam
sarva iti uktyā bhrama jñānāni api parigṛhyante
teṣām ca yat sva rūpa prakāśanam tat ātma saṃvedanam

original: sarve hi cittacaittāḥ pratītisvabhāvatvāt svarūpajñāpakā bhavanti /
analyzed: sarve hi citta caittāḥ pratīti svabhāva tvāt svarūpa jñāpakāḥ bhavanti

original: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvabhāvatvād ātmano 'pi prakāśako bhavati,
analyzed: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśa svabhāva tvāt ātmanaḥ u pi prakāśakaḥ bhavati
sva rūpa prakāśe ca pradīpa antaram caittāḥ
sukha ādayaḥ eva sphuṭa anubhava tvāt sva saṃviditāḥ
na anyā iti etat āśaṅkā nivṛtti artha sarva grahaṇam kṛttam
na asti sā kācid citta avasthā
yasyām ātmanaḥ saṃvedanam na pratyakṣam syāt

original: yena hi rūpeṇātmā vedayate tadrūpamātmasavedanaṃ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: yena hi rūpeṇa ātmā vedayate tat rūpam ātma savedanam pratyakṣam

original: iha ca rūpādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukhādayākārastulyakālaṃ saṃvedayate /
analyzed: iha ca rūpa ādau vastuni dṛśyamāne āntaraḥ sukha ādayākāraḥ tulya kālam saṃvedayate

original: na ca gṛhayamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedayate- iti vaktuṃ śakyamḥ yato nīlādiḥ sātarūpeṇānubhūyate iti ca niścīyate /
analyzed: na ca gṛhayamāṇa ākāraḥ nīla ādiḥ sāta rūpaḥ vedayate iti vaktum śakyam yatas nīla ādiḥ sāta rūpeṇa anubhūyate iti ca niścīyate

original: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yaṃ nīlādiranubhūyate iti niścīyeta,
analyzed: yadi hi sāta rūpaḥ yam nīla ādiḥ anubhūyate iti niścīyeta
syāt tadā tasya sāta ādi rupa tvam

original: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāritvavyāpāro vikalpenānugamyate tat pratykṣam /
analyzed: yasmin rūpe pratyakṣasya sākṣātkāri tva vyāpāraḥ vikalpena anugamyate tat pratykṣam
iti āha sukha ādayaḥ eva ityādi

original: na kevalaṃ prasiddhāḥ sukhaḥ dayaścittarcattāḥ svasaṃvedanā gṛhyanteḥ anye 'pi svasaṃvedanā iti tātparyam /
analyzed: na kevalam prasiddhāḥ sva saṃvedanāḥ anye pi sva saṃvedanāḥ iti tātparyam
amum eva artha darśayati na asti ityādinā
śuddhasya citta avasthā rūpasya asaṃveditasya abhāvam āha iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ brubatā ṭīkākṛtānena nirodhasamāpattyasthāyāṃ śuddhacittābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ /
analyzed: evam brubatā ṭīkā kṛtā anena nirodha samāpatti asthāyām śuddhacitta abhāvaḥ eva iti abhiprāyaḥ pradarśitaḥ

original: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ na kācit cittāvasthā saṃvedayate yataḥ /
analyzed: tasyām avasthāyām na kācid citta avasthā saṃvedayate yatas
nanu citta caittānām ātma saṃvedaḥ na na asti
sva ātmani kāri tva virodhāt iti uktam
iti āha yena hi ityādi
yasmāt anena bodha svarūpeṇa ātma svarūpam vedayate
tat pratyakṣam ātma saṃvedanam ucyate

original: evaṃ manyate- yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayannātmaprakāśane na pradīpāntamapekṣate,
analyzed: evam manyate yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśa tayā sva rūpam nivedayan ātma prakāśane na pradīpa antam apekṣate

original: tathā cittādikamapi saṃvidrūpatayā svarūpaṃ nivedayadātmasaṃvedane na jñānāntaramapekṣate /
analyzed: tathā citta ādikam api saṃvid rūpa tayā sva rūpam nivedayat ātma saṃvedane na jñāna antaram apekṣate
na ca sva ātmani kāri tva virodhaḥ
yatas vāstava kāraka tva abhāvaḥ
atrā api kalpanayā prakāścya prakāśaka tvena karma kartṛ bhāvaḥ

original: tatrāpi nīlākārotpattireva prakāśakatvaṃ jñānasya pradīpasyāpi prāgbhāvitvameva /
analyzed: tatra api nīla ākāra utpattiḥ eva prakāśaka tvam jñānasya pradīpasya api prāc bhāvi tvam eva
bodhasya tu bodha rūpa tayā utpattiḥ eva sva prakāśaka tvam

original: tataśca vijñānaṃ bodharūpatayā pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ kathamapahnuyate bhavatā parokṣaṃ vijñānamiti /
analyzed: tatas ca vijñānam bodha rūpa tayā pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyamānam katham apahnuyate bhavatā parokṣam vijñānam iti

original: evaṃ tāvat mausāṃsakādīn prati vijñānaṃ saṃvedanapratyakṣanirdiṣṭam /
analyzed: evam tāvat mausāṃsaka ādīn prati vijñānam saṃvedana pratyakṣa nirdiṣṭam

original: yastu sāṃkhyo 'pi bāhyārūpāḥ sukhādayaḥ iti manyate,
analyzed: yaḥ tu sāṃkhyaḥ u pi bāhya ārūpāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti manyate
tam pratyāha iha ca

original: tathā cittacaitā api svarūpāvabodhe jñānāntaraṃ nāpekṣante /
analyzed: tathā cittacaitāḥ api sva rūpa avabodhe jñāna antaram na apekṣante
tatas ca sva siddha bhāvāḥ svayam pratyakṣa pramāṇam bhavanti
bhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jam yogi jñānam iti
bhūtaḥ aviparītaḥ arthaḥ iti bhūtārthaḥ
yathā catvāri ārya satyāni
tasya bhāvanā bhūta artha bhāvanā

original: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sātarūpatvamanugamyate /
analyzed: bhāvanā iti na ca nīlasya sāta rūpa tvam anugamyate
tasmāt asātāt nīlāt ayarthāt anyat eva sātam anubhṛyate nīla anubhava kāle
tat ca jñānam eva
tatas sti jñāna anubhavaḥ
tat ca ātmanaḥ sākṣātkāri nirvikalpakam
a bhra antam ca
tatas pratyakṣam
vyākhyātu kāmaḥ āha bhata artha ityādi
bhūtaḥ sat bhūtaḥ rthaḥ
pramāṇena dṛṣṭaḥ ca sadbhūtaḥ
yathā catvāri āya satyāni
bhūtasya bhāvanā punar punar cetasi viniveśanam
bhāvanāyāḥ prakarṣaḥ bhāvyamāna artha bhāsasya jñānasya sphuṭa ābha tva ārambhaḥ
prakarṣasya paryantaḥ yadā sphuṭa ābha tvam īṣat asampūrṇa bhavati
yāvat hi sphuṭa ābha tva paripūrṇa tāvat tasya prakarṣa gamanam
rūpa ādau dṛśyamāne ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- nīlarūpāt sātādikamantaraṃ saṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣeṇānubhūyamānaṃ na bāhayenābhinnarūpaṃ jaḍarūpaṃ ca śakyate vktumiti /
analyzed: evam manyate nīla rūpāt sāta ādikam antaram saṃvedanam pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyamānam na bāhayena abhinna rūpam jaḍa rūpam ca śakyate vktum iti

original: amumvārtha na ca gṛhyamāṇākāra ityādinā darśayati /
analyzed: na ca gṛhyamāṇa ākāraḥ ityādinā darśayati
sākṣātkāri tva vyāpāraḥ iti
pratyakṣasya vyāpāraḥ
vikalpaḥ tad pṛṣṭha bhāvī
na ca nīlasya sāta rūpa tvam anugamyate iti
tad pṛṣṭha bhāvinā vikalpena sāta rūpaḥ nīla ādinā anugamyate iti arthaḥ

original: tena nīlādiḥ sātasvabhāvo na pratyakṣasiddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayaṃ nirākurvatā grāhyāgrāhakaṃ sātādirūpaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pradarśitam /
analyzed: tena nīla ādiḥ sāta svabhāvaḥ na pratyakṣa siddhaḥ iti sāṅkhayam nirākurvatā grāhya agrāhakam sāta ādi rūpam bhinnam pratyakṣam pradarśitam

original: tena yuktamuktaṃ kaiścit- grāhayād bhinnaṃ grāhakaṃ na pratyakṣeṇānubhūyate iti /
analyzed: tena yuktam uktam kaiścid bhinnam grāhakam na pratyakṣeṇa anubhūyate iti
tena kiñcid nāma na apahvu tam bhavati iti uktam
tasmāt sarvāṇi etāni citta caitāni sva saṃvedana pratyakṣāṇi iti
teṣām lakṣaṇam yojayati tat ca ityādinā
tat pratyakṣam sva saṃvedana rūpam nirvikalpakam tatra śabda ādi yojana abhāvāt
kutas śabdena saṃketa abhāvāt
a bhrāntam ca tat vijñānam svarūpe viparyasta tvāt
bādhaka abhāvāt ca iti
bhāvyamāna artha ābhāsasya iti
sphuṭa ābha tva ārambhaḥ ityādi ayatiśayasya upakramāt
tatas pareṇa atiśaya abhāvāt jñānasya

original: tataśca kṣaṇikatvādigrāhi manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānamīṣadasampūrṇamantakṣaṇaḥ prakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
analyzed: tatas ca kṣaṇika tva ādi grāhi manaḥ vijñānam bhāvyamānam īṣat asampūrṇam anta kṣaṇaḥ prakarṣa paryantaḥ ucyate
tat eva darśayati abhyāsaḥ
tasya āh prakarṣaḥ bhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣaḥ
smṛti upasthāna ūṣma gata mūrdha kṣāntayaḥ
tasya paryantaḥ bhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣa paryantaḥ
paryantaḥ tu agra dhamāḥ
tasmāt jāyate iti bhūta artha bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta jam
yogaḥ samādhiḥ
sa yeṣām asti te yoginaḥ
teṣām jñāna yogi jñānam

original: tathā hi samādhivalaprabhavaṃ bhūta-bhāvi-vartamānānāṃ yathāyartha prakāśakaṃ jyotiḥ avibhramamāvirbhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi samādhi vala prabhavam bhūta bhāvi vartamānānām yathāyartha prakāśakam jyotiḥ avibhramam āvirbhavati

original: yathā devādyaṣṭhānaprabhāveṇa satyāni svapnajñānāni bhūta-bhāvi- sampūrṇa tu yadā,
analyzed: yathā satyāni svapna jñānāni bhūta bhāvi tu yadā
tadā na asti prakarṣa gatiḥ

original: tataḥ sampūrṇāvasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭābhatvaprakarṣaparyanta ucyate /
analyzed: tatas sampūrṇa avasthāyāḥ prāktanī avasthā sphuṭa ābha tva prakarṣa paryantaḥ ucyate

original: tasmāt paryantāt yajjātaṃ bhāvyamānasyāthasya sannihitasyeva sphuṭatarākāragrāhi jñānaṃ yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: tasmāt paryantāt yat jātam bhāvyamānasya athasya sannihitasya iva sphuṭatara ākāra grāhi jñānam yoginaḥ pratyakṣam
tat iha sphuṭa ābha tva ārambha avasthā bhāvanā prakarṣaḥ

original: abhrakavyavahitamiva yadā bhāvyāmānaṃ vastu paśyati sā prakarṣaparyantāvasthā /
analyzed: abhraka vyavahitam iva yadā bhāvi āmānam vastu paśyati sā prakarṣa paryantā avasthā

original: karatalāmalakavat bhāvyamānasyārthasya yad darśana tad yoginaḥ pratyakṣam /
analyzed: kara tala āmalaka vat bhāvyamānasya arthasya yat tat yoginaḥ pratyakṣam
tat hi sphuṭa ābham
yadā sphuṭa ābha tvam ityādinā

original: tadiha sphuṭābhatvārambhetyādinā upasaṃhāracyajena yogino manovijñānasyāvasthātrayaṃ darśayati- bhāvanāprakarṣāvasthaikā,
analyzed: tat iha sphuṭa ābha tva ārambha ityādinā upasaṃhāra cyajena yoginaḥ manaḥ vijñānasya avasthā trayam darśayati bhāvanā prakarṣa avasthā ekā
prakarṣa paryantā avasthā dvitīyā
bhāvyamānasya kara tala āmalaka vat darśanam yoginaḥ tṛtīya avasthā iti
tat iha sphuṭa ābham ityādinā yoginaḥ manaḥ vijñānam api sphuṭa ābha tvāt eva indriya vijñāna vat nivikalpakam darśayati
nirvikalpa anubaddhasya spaṣṭa arthaḥ pratibhāsate

original: iti nyāyād yadayapi manovijñānena bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantena śabdārtho yugapada gṛhyate tathāpi dvayoḥ svarūpasya sannihitatayā gṛhyamāṇatvāt  #
analyzed: iti nyāyāt manaḥ vijñānena bhāvanā prakarṣa paryantena śabda arthaḥ gṛhyate tathā api dvayoḥ sva rūpasya sannihita tayā gṛhyamāṇa tvāt
tad grāhi vijñānam nirvikalpakam iti

original: nanu ca manovijñānaṃ bhāvyamānaṃ vācyavācakasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ pratibhāsate yathā,
analyzed: nanu ca manaḥ vijñānam bhāvyamānam vācya vācaka saṃsṛṣṭam pratibhāsate yathā

original: tathaiva bhāvyamānaṃ prakarṣaparyantarja manovijñānaṃ vācyavācakapratirbhāsi sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā eva bhāvyamānam manaḥ vijñānam vācya vācaka pratirbhāsi sphuṭa ābham bhavati
tadā sphuṭa ābha tvāt nirvikalakaḥ yam iti anaikantikaḥ hetuḥ iti yat ca uditam pareṇa
tat parihatu m upakramate vikalpa vijñānam hi ityādinā

original: eva manyate- aydyapi manovijñānaṃ vācya vācakasaṃsṛṣṭipratibhāsi,
analyzed: eva manyate aydi api manaḥ vijñānam vācya vācaka saṃsṛṣṭi pratibhāsi
tathā api sphuṭa ābha tva avasthāyām tad alīka ākāram vācya vācaka rūpam apaiti
vitti rūpam tu tasya nijam
atas tat eva cit rūpam jñānam sphuṭam bhavati
na vācya vācaka ākāra tayāḥ tayoḥ ārapita rūpa tvāt
āropita rūpa grahaṇa sphuṭa tvam eva na syāt iti na anekāntika tvam hetoḥ
sphuṭa ābha tvāt ityasya
yadā tu vikalpa vijñānam śabda saṃsarga yogya vastu gṛhṇati
tadā saṃketa kāla dṛṣṭa tvena tat vastu gṛhṇāti
tat asannihitam tadā vividha vastu viṣayāṇi avibhramāṇi utpadyante

original: tathaiva yogabalena dhyeyānāṃ jñānamatītānāgata dūra sāntara aṇubhūtaviṣayāṇā prakāśakaṃ jyotīrūpamutpadyate /
analyzed: tathā eva yoga balena dhyeyānām jñānam atīta anāgata dūra sa antara aṇu bhūta viṣayāṇā prakāśakam jyotī rūpam utpadyate
tasmāt pratyakṣa pramāṇa tvam iṣayte

original: atra prayogaḥ- yogīśvarāṇāmekāgracittānāṃ jñānaṃ bhūta bhāvi vastuviṣayakaṃ pramāṇam ameyabhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetutvād,
analyzed: atra prayogaḥ yogi īśvarāṇām ekāgra cittānām jñānam bhūta bhāvi vastu viṣayakam pramāṇam ameya bhūta bhāvi vastu jātasya abhrānta upadarśana hetu tvāt
bhūta graha viśeṣa āviṣṭu jñāna vat
yat na prāmāṇikam tat na ameya bhūta bhāvi vastu jātasya abhrānta upadarśana hetu
yathā a unmatta jñānam

original: aprāpakasyāpi ameya bhūta bhāvivastujātasya abhrāntopadarśanahetave 'yogyamapakārakamapi pramāṇaṃ ṣyāt /
analyzed: a prāpakasya api ameya bhūta bhāvi vastu jātasya abhrānta upadarśana hetave yogyam apakārakam api pramāṇam syāt

original: dambhamātreṇāmeyasya padārthasya abhrāntopadarśanaṃ hi na sambhavati /
analyzed: dambha mātreṇa ameyasya padārthasya abhrānta upadarśanam hi na sambhavati

original: tasya vyākhyānam- yathā grahaviśeṣāveśe bhūta bhāvivastusamūhānuśāsanam,
analyzed: tasya vyākhyānam yathā graha viśeṣa āveśe bhūta bhāvi vastu samūha anuśāsanam
tathā yogiṣu api bhūta bhāvi vastu anuśāsanam abhrāntam upalabhyate
yathā harītakyādi bhāvi roga nirāaraṇa samartham iti caraka ādi minīnām abhrāntam anuśāsanam upalabhyate

original: yathā vā bhagavata śākyamunerupadeśe bhāvideśanimitta satyopalabdhi mātṛceṭa kālakṣaya rājāśokādi āśāvana kaśmīrādeśāgamā aviparītā upalabhyante
analyzed: yathā vā bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ upadeśe bhāvi deśa nimitta satya upalabdhi mātṛ ceṭa kāla kṣaya rāja aśoka ādi āśāvana kaśmīra ādeśa āgamāḥ aviparītāḥ upalabhyante
sphuṭa ābha tvāt eva ca nirvikalpakam

original: vikalpavijñānaṃ hi saṃketakāladṛṣṭatvena vastu gṛhṇat śabdasaṃsargayogyaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
analyzed: vikalpa vijñānam hi saṃketa kāla dṛṣṭa tvena vastu gṛhṇat śabda saṃsarga yogyam gṛhṇīyāt
saṃketa kāla dṛṣṭa tvam ca saṃketa kāla utpanna jñāna viṣaya tvam

original: yathā ca pūrvotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ samprati asat,
analyzed: yathā ca pūrva utpannam vinaṣṭam jñānam samprati asat
tadvat pūrva vinaṣṭa jñānam api samprati nā asti vastunaḥ
tat asat rūpam vastunaḥ gṛhṇat
asannihita artha grāhi tvāt asphuṭa ābham vikalpakam
tatas sphuṭa ābha tvāt ni vikalpakam
pramāṇa śuddha artha grāhi tvāt ca saṃvādakam
atas pratyakṣam
itara pratyakṣa vat
yogaḥ samādhiḥ
sa yasya asti iti yogī
tasya jñānam pratyakṣam
iti śabdaḥ parisamāpti vacanaḥ
iyat eva pratyakṣam iti
tasya saṃketa abhāvāt
tat ca pūrva dṛṣṭam pūrva vijñānasya viṣayaḥ
tat ca pūrva vijñānam saṃprati śabda saṃsarga yogya vastu grahaṇa kāle na asti
kṣaṇika tvāt jñānasya
tadvat pūrva vijñāna viṣaya tvam api

original: viṣayiṇo jñānasyābhāve viṣayasyāpyarthasya saṃketakālabhāvi no 'bhāva ityasannihitaṃ saṃketakālabhāvi tad vastvāropya gṛhṇad vikalpavijñānamasphuṭaṃ  #
analyzed: viṣayiṇaḥ jñānasya abhāve viṣayasya api arthasya saṃketa kāla bhāvi no bhāvaḥ iti asannihitam saṃketa kāla bhāvi tat vastu āropya gṛhṇat vikalpa vijñānam asphuṭam
bhavati iti

original: sphuṭatvaṃ tato nivṛttaṃ nirvikalpe 'vattiṣṭhate iti vyāptiḥ sidhyati /
analyzed: sphuṭa tvam tatas nivṛttam nirvikalpe vat tiṣṭhate iti vyāptiḥ sidhyati

original: tataḥ sphuṭatvānnirvikalpakaṃ yogijñānamabhrāntaṃ ca pramāṇena śuddhārthagrāhitvāt saṃvādakam /
analyzed: tatas sphuṭa tvāt nirvikalpakam yogi jñānam abhra antam ca pramāṇena śuddha artha grāhi tvāt saṃvādakam
iyat eva iti indriya vijñānāt ārabhya yogi jñāna paryantam na ekam eva indriya pratyakṣam iti arthaḥ
na api adhikam adhikasya an upalabhyāt
tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam
viṣaya vipratipatti nirāsa artham āha tasya viṣayaḥ sva lakṣaṇam iti

original: pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ yaduktam- tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇameva iti draṣṭavyam,
analyzed: pratyakṣam pramāṇam yat uktam tasya viṣayaḥ sva lakṣaṇam eva iti draṣṭavyam
na tu sāmānya lakṣaṇam sāmānyasya avastu tvāt
pratyakṣeṇa ca vastu svarūpa upalambhāt

original: tadevaṃ pratyakṣasya kalpanāpoḍhatvābhrāntatvayuktasya prakārabhedaṃ pratipādaya viṣayavipratipatti nirākatukāma āha- tasyetyādi /
analyzed: tat evam pratyakṣasya kalpanā apoḍha tva abhrānta tva yuktasya prakāra bhedam pratipādaya viṣaya vipratipatti nirākatu kāmaḥ āha tasya ityādi

original: tasya catuvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tasya catuvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ boddhavyaḥ sva lakṣaṇam
svam asādhāraṇam lakṣaṇam tattvam svalakṣaṇam

original: vastuno hyasādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvamasti sāmānyaṃ ca /
analyzed: vastunaḥ hi asādhāraṇam ca tattvam asti sāmānyam ca
tatra yat asādhāraṇam tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam

original: dvividho hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya- grāhyaśca yadākāramutpadyate,
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi viṣayaḥ pramāṇasya grāhyaḥ ca yad ākāram utpadyate
prāpaṇīyaḥ ca yam adhyavasyati
anyaḥ hi grāhyaḥ
anyaḥ ca adhyavaseyaḥ
pratyakṣasya hi kṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ grāhyaḥ
adhyavaseyaḥ tu pratyakṣa bala utpannena niścayena santānaḥ eva
santānaḥ eva ca pratyakṣasya prāpaṇīyaḥ
kṣaṇasya prāpayitum aśakya tvāt
tathā anumānam api sva pratibhāse na arthe rtha adhyavasāyena pravṛtteḥ anartha grāhi
prakāra bhedam iti
pratyakṣam sāmānyam nirvikalpakam abhra antām
tasya prakāra bhedaḥ indriya jñāna ādiḥ
tam pratipādya iti arthaḥ
viṣaya vipratipattim iti

original: iha kaiścinmīmāṃsakābidhiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānyaviśeṣo dvāvapi viṣayakalpitau /
analyzed: iha kaiścid mīmāṃsakāḥ bidhiḥ pratyakṣasya sāmānya viśeṣaḥ dvau api viṣaya kalpitau
anumānasya sāmānyam eva viṣayaḥ na viśeṣaḥ

original: sāṅkhayena dvayorapi viśeṣo viṣaya iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: sāṅkhayena dvayoḥ api viśeṣaḥ viṣayaḥ iṣṭaḥ sāmānyasya abhāvāt
vedāntavādinā ca sāmānyam eva viṣayaḥ dvayoḥ

original: ātmārdvatatayā sarvasyaikatvāda viśeṣe bhrāntatvāda dvayoriti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣādiviṣaye /
analyzed: ātma ārdva tatayā sarvasya ekatvāt a viśeṣe bhrānta tvāt dvayoḥ iti vipratipattiḥ pratyakṣa ādi viṣaye
sva lakṣaṇam iti
anena iṣṭam viṣāyam darśayati
tattvam iti
arthakriyā kāri
anena lakṣaṇa śabdaḥ vivṛtaḥ
lakṣyate dāha ādi arthakriyā yena tat lakṣaṇam

original: etad darśayati asādharaṇameva tattvaṃ vastuno rūpam /
analyzed: etat darśayati asādharaṇam eva tattvam vastunaḥ rūpam

original: sādhāraṇaṃ tu tattvamāropitaṃ rūpam pūrvāparakṣaṇā nāmabhedāvyavasāyāt /
analyzed: sādhāraṇam tu tattvam āropitam rūpam pūrva apara kṣaṇāḥ nāma bheda avyavasāyāt
atas vastunaḥ rūpa dvayam asādhāraṇam
sāmānyam ca

original: tatrā sādhāraṇatattvaṃ pratyakṣasya grāhaviṣaya iti darśayati- yadasādhāraṇamityādinā /
analyzed: tatra sādhāraṇa tattvam pratyakṣasya grāha viṣayaḥ iti darśayati yat asādhāraṇam ityādinā
nanu kim ucyate grāhya viṣayaḥ iti
yāvatā kim anyaḥ viṣayaḥ sti pratyakṣasya
asti iti āha dvividhaḥ ityādi
yam adhyavasyati iti

original: yaṃ santānarūpeṇa sthitamartha tat pṛṣṭha bhāvina vikalpena vinścinoti /
analyzed: yam santāna rūpeṇa tat bhāvina vikalpena

original: nanu ca kathaṃ pratyakṣasya santāno viṣayaḥ,
analyzed: nanu ca katham pratyakṣasya santānaḥ viṣayaḥ
yatas vikalpasya asau viṣayaḥ
ucyate upacārāt

original: pratyakṣavyāpāreṇa vikalpenādhyavaseyatayā viṣayīkṛtatvāt pratyakṣaviṣaya ityucyate upacārādityadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa vyāpāreṇa vikalpena adhyavaseya tayā viṣayīkṛta tvāt pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ iti ucyate upacārāt iti adoṣaḥ
dvaividhyam eva sphuṭayati anyaḥ hi ityādinā
yasya arthasya sannidhāna asannidhānābhyām jñāna pratibhāsa bhedaḥ tat svalakṣaṇam
sva lakṣaṇam ca kīdṛśam avagantavyam iti ced
tatra āha yasya iti
sannidhānam yogya deśe sthitiḥ
a sa nidhānam ayogya deśe sthitiḥ
sarvathā sarvatra abhāvaḥ ca
sannidhānam ca asannidhānam ca iti sannidhāna asannidhāne
tābhyām hi jñāne visphuṭa tva asphuṭa tva viśeṣaḥ kriyate
sannidhāne sphuṭa pratibhāsam jñānam utpadyate

original: asannidhāne sa punarāropito 'rtho gṛhyamāṇaḥ svalakṣaṇetvenāvasīyate yataḥ,
analyzed: asannidhāne sa punar āropitaḥ rthaḥ gṛhyamāṇaḥ sva lakṣaṇa itvena avasīyate yatas
tatas sva lakṣaṇam avasitam pravṛtti viṣayaḥ numānasya
anarthaḥ tu grāhyaḥ

original: tadatra pramāṇasya grāhya viṣayaṃ darśayatā pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣaya uktaḥ // 12 //
analyzed: tat atra pramāṇasya grāhya viṣayam darśayatā pratyakṣasya sva lakṣaṇam viṣayaḥ uktaḥ  /

original: kaḥ punarasau viṣayo jñānasya yaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ pratipattavyaḥ?
analyzed: kaḥ punar asau viṣayaḥ jñānasya yaḥ sva lakṣaṇam pratipattavyaḥ
ityāhayasya arthasya ityādi
artha śabdaḥ viṣaya paryāyaḥ
yasya jñāna viṣayasya
sannidhānam nikaṭa deśa avasthānam
asannidhānam dūra deśa avasthānam

original: tasmāt sannidhānādasannidhānācca jñānapratibhāsasya grāhyakārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭatvāsphuṭatvābhyām /
analyzed: tasmāt sannidhānāt asannidhānāt ca jñāna pratibhāsasya grāhya kārasya bhedaḥ sphuṭa tva asphuṭa tvābhyām
tathā anumānam ityādinā prasaṃgena anumānasya api viṣaya dvaividhya darśayati

na prāpyam viṣayam iti darśayati

original: evaṃ manyate- nanu pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayaḥ ityukte sāmānyamapi tasya viṣaya iti tadap svalakṣaṇaṃ prāpnotīti praśnaḥ /
analyzed: evam manyate nanu pratyakṣasya sva lakṣaṇam viṣayaḥ iti ukte sāmānyam api tasya viṣayaḥ iti sva lakṣaṇam prāpnoti iti praśnaḥ

original: asannidhānaṃ dūradeśāvasthānamiti bruvatā vinītadeva sya vyākhyā dūṣitā /
analyzed: asannidhānam dūra deśa avasthānam iti bruvatā vyākhyā dūṣitā

original: tena hyevaivyākhyātam- sarveṇa rūpeṇa vastuno 'bhāvo 'sannidhānam iti /
analyzed: tena hi eva e vyākhyātam sarveṇa rūpeṇa vastunaḥ sannidhānam iti

original: etadasaṅgatam yasmād vastunastatrābhāve jñānameva ha bhavati /
analyzed: etat asaṅgatam yasmāt vastunaḥ tatra abhāve jñānam eva ha bhavati
tatas ca jñāna pratibhāsa bhedaḥ iti na ghaṭate
yaḥ hi ityādinā itat darśayati
artha kriyā samarthasya eva sannidhāna asannidhānābhyām sphuṭa asphuṭa pratibhāsa bhedaḥ
na sāmānyasya iti

original: na sāmānyaṃ svalakṣaṇam āropitarūpasya dūrāsannābhyāṃ sarvadavādphuṭatvāditi /
analyzed: na sāmānyam sva lakṣaṇam āropita rūpasya dūra āsannābhyām sarva davāt phuṭa tvāt iti

original: nanu sāmānyameva dūre gṛhyamāṇamasphuṭapratibhāsaṃ na svalakṣaṇam?
analyzed: nanu sāmānyam eva dūre gṛhyamāṇam asphuṭa pratibhāsam na sva lakṣaṇam
iti āha sarvāṇi eva iti āhi

atas tāni eva sva lakṣaṇāni sphuṭa asphuṭa pratibhāsīni
na sāmānyam

original: nanu yadi dūrāsannābhyāṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ spaṣṭāspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ rūpadvayaṃ tasya syāt,
analyzed: nanu yadi dūra āsannābhyām sva lakṣaṇam spaṣṭa aspaṣṭa pratibhāsam rūpa dvayam tasya syāt

original: tataśca nikaṭasthitasya pratibhāsadvayaṃ syāt na ca niyamaḥ- dūre 'spaṣṭam,
analyzed: tatas ca nikaṭa sthitasya pratibhāsa dvayam syāt na ca niyamaḥ dūre spaṣṭam

original: ucyate na hi nolaṃ vastu spaṣṭarūpamaspaṣṭaṃ ca,
analyzed: ucyate na hi nolam vastu spaṣṭa rūpam aspaṣṭam ca
apitu nīlam sādhya artha kriyā samartha
tat eva paramārtha sat
ca asphuṭam jñānam utpadyate

original: jñāne yo 'rthaḥ pratibhāsavailakṣaṇyaṃ karoti sa eva svalakṣaṇam // 13 //

tat evam pramāṇa prameya vyavahāra ārope rtha niścaya lakṣaṇam phalam bhavati
jñānam artha viniścayana svabhāvam
pratyakṣam eva phala svabhāvam iṣṭam

original: tasmāt pratyakṣasyārthaniścayasvabhavatvāt pratyakṣameva phalasvabhāvaṃ syāditi veditavyamityuktaṃ bhavati // 19 //
analyzed: tasmāt pratyakṣasya artha niścaya svabhava tvāt pratyakṣam eva phala svabhāvam syāt iti veditavyam iti uktam bhavati
yadi pratyakṣam eva phala svabhāvam
tarhi pramāṇam nāma kim veditavyam
iti āśaṅkāyām āha artha ityādi
sārūpyam sādṛśyam
asya iti pratyakṣasya

original: arthākāraṃ yat pratyakṣaṃ tadeva pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ // 20 //
analyzed: artha ākāram yat pratyakṣam tat eva pramāṇam iti śeṣaḥ
artha sārūpyam eva katham pramāṇam
iti āśaṅkayā āha tad vaśa ādarta pratīti siddheḥ iti
tat eva ca pratyakṣam artha pratīti rūpam artha pradarśana rūpam
atarata eva pramāṇa phalam
yadi tarhi jñānam pramiti rūpa tvāt pramāṇa phalam
ki tarhi pramāṇa phalam
iti āha artha ityādi

original: arthena saha yat sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyam asya jñānasya tat pramāṇam /
analyzed: arthena saha yat sārūpyam sādṛśyam asya jñānasya tat pramāṇam

original: iha yasmād viṣayāt viṣayāt vijñānamudeti tadviṣayasadṛśaṃ tad bhavati yathā- nīlādutpadayamānaṃ nīlasadṛśam /
analyzed: iha yasmāt viṣayāt viṣayāt vijñānam udeti tad viṣaya sadṛśam tat bhavati yathā nīlāt utpadayamānam nīla sadṛśam
tat ca sārūpyam sādṛśyam
ākāraḥ iti
ābhāsaḥ iti api vyapadiśyate
nanu ca jñānāt avyatiriktam sādṛśyam

original: tathā ca sati tadeva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ sa eveti /
analyzed: tathā ca sati tat eva jñānam pramāṇam saḥ eva iti
yadi evam prāpaṇa śaktiḥ phalam
tarhi nā artha pariccitti rūpam phalam
prāpaka tvāt
artha pariccitteḥ anya tvāt iti āha uktam ca purastāt iyādi
yat eva prāpakam jñānam tat eva pravartakam

original: arthapradarśakaṃ ca tadeveti purastāt saṃvarṇitaṃ pramāṇasvarūpacintāyām /
analyzed: artha pradarśakam ca tat eva iti purastāt saṃvarṇitam pramāṇa svarūpa cintāyām
tatas ca artha prada śekam eva prāpakam

original: tasya ca prāpaṇaśaktirarthapariccittireva tāvatā parisamāptatvāt pramāṇavyāpārasyeti sthitam /
analyzed: tasya ca prāpaṇa śaktiḥ artha pariccittiḥ eva tāvatā parisamāpta tvāt pramāṇa vyāpārasya iti sthitam
pramāṇasya phalam artha pariccitti rūpam eva na anyat iti
yadi jñānasya pramiti rūpam phalam

original: jñānāt tarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyamiti manyamānaḥ pṛccati- yadi tarhītyādinā /
analyzed: jñānāt tarhi pramāṇena bhinnena bhavitavyam iti manyamānaḥ pṛccati yadi tarhi ityādinā
artha sārūpyam asya pramāṇam iti
etasya vivaraṇam arthena yat sārūpyam ityādi
evam manyate artha sārūpyam vijñānasya pramāṇam
na aindriya ādikam iti

original: viṣayādutpadyamānaṃ viṣayasadṛśaṃ bhavatīti tadeva sārūpyaṃ sādṛśyamuktamiti darśayati- iha yasmādityādinā // 20 //
analyzed: viṣayāt utpadyamānam viṣaya sadṛśam bhavati iti tat eva sārūpyam sādṛśyam uktam iti darśayati iha yasmāt ityādinā
nanu ca ityādi
evam manyate paraḥ indriya ādikam pramāṇam uktam asmābhiḥ
tat eva kim yasmāt artham ārūpya vaśāt niścayaḥ
tasmāt tat sārūpyam eva pramāṇam

original: evaṃ hi nīlasya pratītiriyam na pātasya iti vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: evam hi nīlasya pratītiḥ iyam na pātasya iti vyavasthāpyate

original: tatra ca yo hetuḥ sa eva pramāṇatveneṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca yaḥ hetuḥ saḥ eva pramāṇa tvena iṣṭhaḥ
indriyasya tu etat vayavasthiti karaṇe na asti sāmarthyam

original: tathā hi taccendriyaṃ sarvasyaiva jñānasya sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamiti pratyekaniścayavyavasthitau kathaṃ samartha syāt /
analyzed: tathā hi tat ca indriyam sarvasya eva jñānasya sādhāraṇam kāraṇam iti pratyeka niścaya vyavasthitau katham samartha syāt
yadi tat eva ca pramāṇa phalam

original: na caikaṃ vastu sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ copapadyate,
analyzed: na ca ekam vastu sādhyam sādhanam ca upapadyate
tat katham sārūpyam pramāṇam
iti āha tad vaśāt iti
tat iti sārūpyam
tasya vasāt sārūpya samarthyāt
arthasya pratītiḥ avabodhaḥ
tasyāḥ siddhiḥ
tad siddheḥ kāraṇāt

original: arthasya pratītirūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vijñānaṃ sārūpyavaśāt sidhyati,
analyzed: arthasya pratīti rūpam pratyakṣam vijñānam sārūpya vaśāt sidhyati
pratītam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: nīlānirbhāsaṃ hi vijñānaṃ yataḥ tasmāt nīlasya pratītiravasīyate /
analyzed: nīla anirbhāsam hi vijñānam yatas tasmāt nīlasya pratītiḥ avasīyate
yebhyaḥ hi cakṣuḥ ādibhyaḥ vijñānam utpadyate

original: na tadvaśāt tajjñānaṃ naulasya saṃvedanaṃ śakyate 'vasthāpayitum /
analyzed: na tad vaśāt tat jñānam naulasya saṃvedanam śakyate vasthāpayitum
nīla sadṛśam tu anubhūyamānam nīlasya saṃvedanam avasthāpyate
na ca atra janya janaka bhāva nibandhanaḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ
yena ekasmin vastuni virodhaḥ syāt
apitu vyavasthapya vyavasthāpaka bhāvena
tatas ekasya vastunaḥ bauddhena api na iṣyate
yena artha sārūpyam pramāṇam iti ipyate

original: kiñci- arthasārūpye pramāṇe 'ṅgī kriyamāṇe pramāṇaphalayoraikyānnaikaṃ karma karaṇaṃ bhavatīti yaccoditaṃ tat tadavasthameveti /
analyzed: artha sārūpye pramāṇe ṅgī kriyamāṇe pramāṇa phalayoḥ aikyāt na ekam karma karaṇam bhavati iti yat ca uditam tat tad avastham eva iti
tad vaśāt ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- pramāṇaṃ karaṇaṃ ca sādhakatamaṃ kārakāṇām /
analyzed: evam manyate pramāṇam karaṇam ca sādhakatamam kārakāṇām
prakṛṣṭa upakārakam jñānasya sārūpyam eva tad vaśāt artha adhigati siddheḥ
na indriya ādikam
artha sārūpya abhāve rtha pratīteḥ abhāvāt iti
amum eva artha darśayati arthasya pratītiḥ avabodhaḥ ityādinā
nīla nirbhāsam hi ityādinā
nīla ākāram nīla vijñānasya nīla avagama vyavasthāyāḥ nimittam darśayati
yasmāt nīla ākāre vijñānasya avagate
tasmāt artha ākāraḥ pramāṇam karaṇa dharma tvāt asya iti

original: nanu ca cakṣurādibhyo vijñānamutpadyate viśiṣṭārtha mavagaccatyeva tat kathamarthākārasya prakṛṣṭopakārakatvam?
analyzed: nanu ca cakṣuḥ ādibhyaḥ vijñānam utpadyate viśiṣṭa artham avagaccati eva tat katham arthākārasya prakṛṣṭa upakāraka tvam
iti āha yebhyaḥ hi ityādi
tat kathayati cakṣuḥ ādīnām api vijñāna utpattau nimitta abhāvaḥ sti

original: kintu teṣāṃ sarvajñānotpatti prati nimittatvānna pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanasya nimittatvam /
analyzed: kintu teṣām sarva jñāna utpatti prati nimitta tvāt na pratiniyata artha vyavasthāpanasya nimitta tvam

original: arthākārasya tvasādhāraṇatvāt pratiniyatārthavyavasthāpanaṃ prati nimittatvamiti tadeva pramāṇam /
analyzed: arthākārasya tu asādhāraṇa tvāt pratiniyata artha vyavasthāpanam prati nimitta tvam iti tat eva pramāṇam

original: yat tat pareṇa coditam- pramāṇaphalayoraikyātra caikaṃ sādhyaṃ sādhana vā syāditi?
analyzed: yat tat pareṇa coditam pramāṇa phalayoḥ aikyā atra ca ekam sādhyam sādhana vā syāt iti
tat pariharati na ca atra janya janaka ityādinā

original: dyādayamekasya virodho yadyayaṃ janyajanakabhāvaḥ pramāṇaphalayoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ, ki tarhi?
analyzed: dyāt ayam ekasya virodhaḥ yadi ayam janya janaka bhāvaḥ pramāṇa phalayoḥ sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ ki tarhi
vyavasthāpya vyavasthāpaka bhāvaḥ
kutas jñāna adhikārāt

original: yasmājjñāne viśiṣṭa utpanne pratipattrā viśiṣṭho 'rtho jñāpayte,
analyzed: yasmāt jñāne viśiṣṭe utpanne pratipattrā viśiṣṭhaḥ rthaḥ jñāpayte
at t indriyam nīla jñānasya eva janakam syāt

original: pītādijñānaṃ ca na janayet tadaiva vyavasthāya samartha syāt /

sannidhānam api sādhāraṇa tvāt indriya vat na vyavasthiti hetuḥ

vyavasthāpana hetuḥ hi sārūpyam tasya jñānasya

original: vyavasthāpya- vyavasthāpakabhāvo 'pi kathamekasya jñānasya iti cet?
analyzed: katham ekasya jñānasya iti ced

original: ucyate nīlasadṛśamanubhūya tadvijñānaṃ yato nīlasya grāhakamavasthāpyate niścaya pratyayena,
analyzed: ucyate nīla sadṛśam anubhūya tat vijñānam yatas nīlasya grāhakam avasthāpyate niścaya pratyayena

niścaya pratyayena ca tat jñānam nīla saṃvedanam avasthāpyamānam vyavasthāpyam

anīla bodha vṛttyā ca nīla bodha rūpa tvam vyavasthāpyam
vyavasthāpakaḥ ca vikalpa pratyayaḥ pratyakṣa bala utpannaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: na tu nirvikalpakatvāt pratyaksameva nīlavodharūpatvenātmānamavasthapayituṃ śaknoti /
analyzed: na tu nirvikalpaka tvāt pratyak sama eva nīla vodha rūpa tvena ātmānam avasthapayitum śaknoti

original: tasmānniścayena nīlabodharūpaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vijñānaṃ nīlabodhātmanā sad bhavati /

original: tathā ca pramāṇaphalamarthā na tvartha utpādyate /

original: tathāhi- nīlākāre vijñāna utpanna viśiṣṭajñānaṃ vyavasthāpayati,

original: nanu ca nirvikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ viśiṣṭākāramutpannaṃ kathaṃ tasya samānakāla evāṃśāṃśitayā

vyavasthāpakaḥ iti
amum eva artha darśayati tyādinā

original: nanu nīlajñānamtpanna svasaṃvedanapratyakṣasiddhaṃ yadi niścayavaśāt pramāṇavyavasthā labhyate,
analyzed: nanu sva saṃvedana pratyakṣa siddham yadi niścaya vaśāt pramāṇa vyavasthā labhyate

original: tadā yupyate vaktum- niścayapratyayena vyavasthāpyate iti,
analyzed: tadā yupyate vaktum niścaya pratyayena vyavasthāpyate iti

original: ityāha- niścayapratyasenāvyavasthāpitamityādi sārūpyaṃ tu asādhāraṇatvāt pratyekaniścayavyavasthitiheturbhavati /
analyzed: iti āha niścaya pratyasena avyavasthāpitam ityādi sārūpyam tu asādhāraṇa tvāt pratyeka niścaya vyavasthiti hetuḥ bhavati

original: tathāhi nīlavijñānasya yo nīlākāraḥ sa pītādijñāne nāstīti vyavasthā syāt /

original: yasmād nīlākāratvād ayaṃ nīlaḥ ityayeva pratītiḥ na tu pītaḥ iti buddhiḥ,
analyzed: yasmāt nīla ākāra tvāt ayam nīlaḥ iti ayā iva pratītiḥ na tu pītaḥ iti buddhiḥ

iti nyāyabindu vistara ṭīkāyām śiṣya hitāyām prathamaḥ pratyakṣa paricchedaḥ

atas sādhakatama tva abhāvāt pramāṇam eva na syāt jñānam

original: hanitena tvadhyavasāyena sārūpyavaśānnīlabodharūpe jñāne vyavasthāpyamāne sārūpyavyavasthāpanahetutvāt pramāṇaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /

adhyavasāya sahitam eva pratyakṣam pramāṇam syāt
na kevalam iti ced
na etat evam yasmāt pratyakṣa bala utpannena adhyasāyena dṛśya tvena arthaḥ vasīyate

darśanam ca artha sākṣātkaraṇa ākhyam pratyakṣa vyāpāraḥ

original: na tu paśyāma iti utprekṣātmakaṃ vikalpavyāpāramanubhavādū adhyavasyanti /
analyzed: na tu paśyāmaḥ iti utprekṣā ātmakam vikalpa vyāpāram anubhavāt adhyavasyanti

original: tasmāt svavyāpāraṃ tiraskṛtya pratyakṣavyāpāramādarśayati- yatrārtha pratyakṣapūrvako 'dhyavasāyaḥ,

original: darśayati / yāvat pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ nitpādayati,
analyzed: darśayati yāvat pratyakṣam sva viṣaye sva ātmani niścayam nitpādayati

original: nanu yadi niścayaṃ vinā pramāṇameva na bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vikalpasahitam,
analyzed: nanu yadi niścayam vinā pramāṇam eva na bhavati pratyakṣam vikalpa sahitam

anumānam dvidhā

original: 3 tatra svārtha trirūpāt liṅgād yadanumaye jñānaṃ tadanumānam //
analyzed: tatra sva artha tri rūpāt liṅgāt yad anumaye jñānam tat anumānam
pratyakṣa anumāna bhedena samyak jñānam dvividham uktam

jñāna abhidhāna ātmakayoḥ sva para artha anumānayoḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam kim api nā asti

original: vibhāgena ca pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sukhena vaktu śakyam /

sva artham iti
ca iti viśeṣeṇa dvaividhyam eva upadarśyate
atra artha iti prayohanam
sva prayojanam para prayojanam ca iti śeṣaḥ
yena ātmanaḥ pratītiḥ tat svārtham

evam pratyakṣam vyākhyāya

anumānam dvidhā dvi prakāram
atha anumāna lakṣaṇe vaktavye kim akasmāt kathyate
ucyate parārtha anumānam śabda ātmakam
sva artha anumānam tu jñāna ātmakam

original: vyaktibhede ca kathite prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śakyate vaktum nānyathā /
analyzed: vyakti bhede ca kathite prati vyakti niyatam lakṣaṇam śakyate vaktum na anyathā

original: aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanamantareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyate iti // 1 //
analyzed: aśakya tām ca prakāra bheda kathanam antareṇa lakṣaṇa nirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakāra bhedaḥ kathyate iti
kim punar tat dvaividhyam

svasmāyidam su artham

original: tatreti / tatra tayoḥ svārtha- parārthānumānayormadhye svārtha jñānaṃ kiṃviṣṭam?
analyzed: tatra iti tatra tayoḥ svārtha parārtha anumānayoḥ madhye svārtha jñānam kiṃviṣṭam

original: yaścaivaṃ sambhāvyate- yadyasāvanna bhaved dṛśya eva bhavediti /

original: tadālambanaṃ ca jñānaṃ dṛśyānupalambhaniścayahetutvād dṛśyānupalambha ucyate /

original: 3 satyamevaitat kevalamekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhavediti dṛśay sambhāvitaḥ /

na vyavahṛtaḥ iti dṛśya anupalambhena vyavahartavyaḥ

original: tajjñānaṃ ca pratyakṣa nivṛttiniścayahetutvāt pratyakṣanivṛttirityuktaṃ draṣṭavyam /

tathā tasmin eka jñāna saṃsargiṇi atīte ca amūḍha smṛti saṃskāre

original: vartamāne ca ghaṭasya tattadrūpamāropitamasata iti draṣṭavyam /

tat evam atīta vartamāna utpanna viṣayā anupalabdhiḥ eva abhāva vyavahāra sādhanī
bhāvi viṣayā tu na iti uktam bhavati

original: tathā hi bhāvikālasya pradeśādidharmī na pratyakṣa /

original: atītakālasya tu dharmī pratyakṣaḥ ghaṭaśūnyapradeśaśca smaryate /

tad ubhaya hetoḥ amūḍha smṛti saṃskāraḥ iti uktam
tasmāt vigata ādi divasīya ghaṭa ādi śūnya pradeśa ādi smaraṇe abhāva vyavahāra siddhiḥ bhavati
vartamāna kālasya ca dharmī ghaṭa ādi śūnya pradeśa ādiḥ api pratyakṣa siddhaḥ
tasmāt tatra abhāva vyavahāra sambandhaḥ sulabhaḥ
amūḍha smṛti saṃskāraḥ iti uktvā hetu asiddhi nirastā
anyathā śūnya pradeśa ādi asmaraṇe nupalabdhiḥ eva na sidhyati
atīta vartamānaḥ iti anena uktaḥ kāla viśeṣaḥ nirdiṣṭhaḥ

original: amūḍho 'bhraṣṭo darśanāhitaḥ smṛtijananarūpaḥ saṃskāro yasmin ghaṭādau sa tathoktaḥ /

tasya atītasya pratipatta pratyakṣasya iti sambandhaḥ
vartamānasya ca pratipattṛ pratyakṣasya iti sambandhaḥ
amūḍha smṛti saṃskāra grahaṇam tu na vartamāna viśeṣaṇam

original: yasmādatīte ghaṭaviviktapradeśadarśane smṛtisaṃskāro mūḍho dṛśyaghaṭānupalambhe dṛśye ca ghaṭe 'mūḍho bhavati /

original: vartamāne tu ghaṭarahitapradeśadarśane na smṛti saṃskāramohaḥ /

original: ata eva na ghaṭābhāve nāpi ghaṭānupalambhe ghaṭe mohaḥ /

tasmāt na vartamāna niṣedhya viśeṣaṇam amūḍha smṛti saṃskāra grahaṇam
smṛti saṃskāra vyabhicāra abhāvāt vartamānasya arthasya
atas eva vartamānasya ca iti

original: ca śabdaḥ kṛto viśeṣaṇarahitasya vartamānasya viśeṣaṇavatātītena samuccayo yathā vijñāyeteti /

original: tathāhi kvacit kāryānupalbdhī dhūmābhāvena dhūmahetorapratibaddhasāmarthyasya abhāve siddhe abhāvapratītirbhavati /
analyzed: tathā hi kvacid kārya anupalbdhī dhūma abhāvena dhūma hetoḥ apratibaddha sāmarthyasya abhāve siddhe abhāva pratītiḥ bhavati

original: yatra yatra dhūmābhāvastatra tatropalabdhilakṣaṇāprāptasyaiva taddhetoranupalabdhiriti svabhāvānupalabdhāvantarbhavati /
analyzed: yatra yatra dhūma abhāvaḥ tatra tatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa aprāptasya eva tad hetoḥ anupalabdhiḥ iti svabhāva anupalabdhau antarbhavati

original: pratipattu ṇāṃ cintābhedād bhedaḥ- kasyacit kāryābhāvadvāreṇa hetvabhāvapratītiḥ,
analyzed: cintā bhedāt bhedaḥ kasyacid kārya abhāva dvāreṇa hetu abhāva pratītiḥ
kasyacid tu svabhāva dvāreṇa
tathā eva vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ kāraṇa anupalabdheḥ ca paramparayā antarbhāvaḥ vagantavyaḥ
svabhāva viruddha upalabdhī ca agninā śota abhāva pratītiḥ
yatra agniḥ tatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya śīta sparśasya eva anupalabdhiḥ iti svabhāva anupalabdhau antarbhāvaḥ
viruddha vyāpta upalabdhau api hetu antara apekṣayā sarva varṇeṣu prakāśa svabhāvaḥ svabhāva anupalabdhi vat eva
tathā kāraṇa viruddha kārya upalabdhau api dhūmena agni siddhiḥ
śīta nivṛtau ca tatra tad viparītasya roma harṣa ādi viśeṣa yukta puruṣasya abhāva siddhiḥ
sā ca tatra upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tādsiha puruṣasya anupalabdhiḥ iti svabhāva anupalabdhau eva antarbhavati  /
ye ca kārya kāraṇa dvaya vyāpti abhedaiḥ bheda abhavena upacārāt svabhāva anupalabdhaḥ antarbhavanti iti āhuḥ
teṣām tad upacāreṇa antarbhāvaḥ

original: paramārthatastu na pratijñaikadeśasyāpi hetutve sati paramparārtho 'pi na ramyaḥ /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tu na pratijñā ekadeśasya api hetu tve sati na ramyaḥ

original: svabhāvaviruddhopalabdhyādiṣu ca vijātīyapramāṇena nivṛtyābhidhānamiti kiṃ kena samānaṃ syāt /
analyzed: svabhāva viruddha upalabdhi ādiṣu ca vijātīya pramāṇena nivṛtya abhidhānam iti kim kena samānam syāt
sva artha anumāne prayoge na sambhavati

original: tatrānupalabdhiprayogaprakāraviśeṣā ekādaśa iti kuta iti cet?
analyzed: tatra anupalabdhi prayoga prakāra viśeṣāḥ ekādaśaḥ iti kutas iti ced
tasmāt āha prayoga darśana ityādi
ca prayogāḥ bhidyante
yadi prayoga antareṣu artha antara vidhi pratiṣedhau
katham tarhi antarbhavanti
iti āha pāramparyeṇa iti
praṇālikayā iti arthaḥ

original: etaduktaṃ bhavati- na sākṣādete prayogā dṛśyānupalabdhimabhidadhati,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati na sākṣāt ete prayogāḥ dṛśya anupalabdhim abhidadhati

tatas praṇālikayā amīṣām svabhāva anupalabdhau saṃgrahaḥ
na sākṣāt iti
yadi prayoga bhedāt eṣa bhedaḥ

original: pramāṇaṃ tu arthakāryamiti pramāṇanivṛttyā kāraṇamātranivṛttinaṃ sidhyatīti // 48 //

original: kāraṇaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca nivartamānaṃ kārya vyāpyaṃ ca nivartayet /

original: yat punah pramāṇasattayā prameyasattā sidhyati, tadyuktam /

analyzed: tathā ca sādhya nivṛttiḥ sādhana nivṛtti niyata tvāt sādhana nivṛttyā vyāptā kathitā

original: yadi ca dharmiṇi sādhayadharmo na bhaved,
analyzed: yadi ca dharmiṇi sādhay adharmaḥ na bhavet
hetuḥ api na bhavet
hetu abhāvena sādhya abhāvasya vyāpta tvāt
asti ca hetuḥ

original: ato vyāpakasya sādhanābhāvasyābhāvād vyāpyasya sādhyābhāvasyābhāva iti sādhyagatirbhavati /
analyzed: atas vyāpakasya sādhana abhāvasya abhāvāt vyāpyasya sādhya abhāvasya abhāvaḥ iti sādhya gatiḥ bhavati

original: tato vaidharmyaprayoge sādhnābhāve sādhyābhāvo niyato darśanīyaḥ sarvatreti nyāyaḥ // 23 //
analyzed: tatas vaidharmya prayoge sādhnā abhāve sādhya abhāvaḥ niyataḥ darśanīyaḥ sarvatra iti nyāyaḥ  /
svabhāva hetoḥ vaidharmya prayogam āha asatya nitya tve iti
iha anitya tvasya sādhyasya abhāvaḥ hetoḥ abhāve niyataḥ ucyate
tena hetu abhāvena sādhya abhāvaḥ
asati agnau na bhavati eva dhūmaḥ

original: atra cāsti dhūma iti kāryahetoḥ prayogaḥ //
analyzed: atra ca asti dhūmaḥ iti kārya hetoḥ prayogaḥ
sādharmyeṇa api hi prayoge rthāt vaidharmya gatiḥ iti
asati tasmin sādhyena hetoḥ anvaya abhāvāt
asati agnau na bhavati eva dhūmaḥ iti
anena vyatirekaḥ uktaḥ atra ca
asti iti anena pakṣa dharmaḥ uktaḥ
kārya hetoḥ prayogaḥ iti
kari ahetoḥ vaidharmyavān
prayogaḥ upadarśitaḥ iti
sādharmya vat anumāne ca anvayaḥ
pakṣa dharmī vyatirekaḥ ca iti trīṇi rūpāṇi na abhivyaktāni
katham para artha anumānam ti rūpa liṅga ākhyānam iti ced
tatra āha sādharmyeṇa iti
yasmāt sāmarthya dvāreṇa sādharmya vat prayoge vaidharmyasya pratītiḥ
tasmāt yathā ukta prasaṅgī na asti iti
sāmarthya ca ced
āha asati iti
yadi vyatirekaḥ na syāt
tadā sādhyena hetoḥ anvayaḥ pi asidhaḥ eva syāt iti
vyāptaḥ uktaḥ triṣu api svabhāva hetuṣu
san utpattimān kṛtakaḥ vā śabdaḥ iti
trayāṇām api pakṣa dharma tva kathanam
iha ca sādhana abhāvasya vyāpakasya abhāvaḥ uktaḥ

original: tato vyāpyo 'pi sādhyābhāvo nivartata iti sādhyagati // 24 //
analyzed: tatas vyāpya u pi sādhya abhāvaḥ nivartate iti sādhya gati  /
kārya hetoḥ vaidharmya vat prayogam āha asati agnau iti
iha api vahni abhāvaḥ dhūma abhāvena vyāptaḥ uktaḥ
asti ca atra dhūmaḥ iti
vyāpakasya dhūma abhāvasya bhāvaḥ uktaḥ
tatas vyāpyasya vahni abhāvasya abhāve sādhya gatiḥ  /
nanu ca sādharmyavati vyatirekaḥ ūna uktaḥ
vaidharmyavati ca anvayaḥ
tat katham etat tri rūpa a liṅga ākhyānām
iti āha sādharmyaiṇa iti

original: sādharmyaiṇāpyabhidheyena yukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt sāmarthyāt vaidharmyasya vyatirekasya gatirbhavatīti /
analyzed: sādharmyaiṇa api abhidheyena yukte prayoge kriyamāṇe arthāt sāmarthyāt vaidharmyasya vyatirekasya gatiḥ bhavati iti
hi iti yasmāt
tasmāt tri rūpa liṅga ākhyānam etat
yadi nāma vyatirekaḥ nvayavatā na uktaḥ
tathā api anvaya vācakaḥ sāmarthyā deva avasīyate  /

original: katham? asati tasmin vyatireke buddhayā vyavasite sādhyena hetoranvayasya buddhayāśyavasitasyābhāvāt /
analyzed: katham asati tasmin vyatireke buddhayā vyavasite sādhyena hetoḥ anvayasya

original: sādhye niyataṃ sādhanamanvayavākyādavasyatā sādhyābhāve sādhanaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
analyzed: sādhye niyatam sādhanam anvaya vākyāt avasyatā sādhya abhāve sādhanam na āśaṅkanīyam
itarathā sādhya niyatam eva na pratītam syāt
sādhya abhāve ca sādhana abhāva gatiḥ vyatireka gatiḥ
atas sādhya niyatasya sādhanasya abhidhāna sāmarthyāt anvaya vākye vasitaḥ vyatirekaḥ  /
tathā vaidharmyeṇa api anvaya gatiḥ
asati tasmin sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvasya asiddheḥ
nahi svabhāva pratibandhe sati ekasya nivṛttau aparasya niyamena nivṛttiḥ
sa ca dvi prakāraḥ sarvasya tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ
tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ ca iti uktam
vaidharmya vat prayoge pi sāmarthyena anvaya pratītiḥ bhavati iti
atha tat ca sādharmya kīdṛśam iti ced
āha asati iti

original: yadi sādhyena hetoranvayo na syāt tadā sādhyābhāve 'pi hetorabhāvaḥ katham syāt // 29 //
analyzed: yadi sādhyena hetoḥ anvayaḥ na syāt tadā sādhya abhāve pi hetoḥ abhāvaḥ katham syāt  /
anvaya abhāve siddhaḥ iti etat kasmāt iti ced
tatra āha nahi ityādi

original: yadi svabhāvapratibandha ātmā svarūpeṇa pratibandho na syāt tadā ekanivṛttāvapi aparasya nivṛttirniyamena na syāt /
analyzed: yadi svabhāva pratibandhaḥ ātmā sva rūpeṇa pratibandhaḥ na syāt tadā eka nivṛttau api aparasya nivṛttiḥ niyamena na syāt
yathā kvacid aśva abhāve gavām api abhāvaḥ na iti
saca sarvasya dvi prakāraḥ iti

original: sarvasyaiva padārthasya yaḥ ko 'pi pratibandho yogyaḥ samupalabhyate sa sarvaḥ prakāradvaya evāntarbhavati /
analyzed: sarvasya eva padārthasya yaḥ kaḥ pi pratibandhaḥ yogyaḥ samupalabhyate sa sarvaḥ prakāra dvaye eva antarbhavati
tādātmya lakṣaṇaḥ tad utpatti lakṣaṇaḥ ca iti ukta
tathā iti yathā anvayavākye
tathā arthāt eva vaidharmyeṇa prayoge nvayasya abhidhīyamānasya api gatiḥ

original: katham? asati tasmin anvaye buddhigṛhīte sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvasyāsiddhe ranavasāyāt /
analyzed: katham asati tasmin anvaye buddhi gṛhīte sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvasya asiddheḥ ranavasāyāt

original: hetvabhāve sādhyābhāvaṃ niyataṃ vyatirekavākyādavasyatā hetuḥ sambhave sādhyābhāvo nāśaṅkanīyaḥ,
analyzed: hetu abhāve sādhya abhāvam niyatam vyatireka vākyāt avasyatā hetuḥ sambhave sādhya abhāvaḥ na āśaṅkanīyaḥ

original: itarathā hetvabhāve niyato na syāt pratītaḥ /
analyzed: itarathā hetu abhāve niyataḥ na syāt pratītaḥ
hetumat tve ca sādhya sattva gatiḥ anvaya gatiḥ
atas sādhana abhāva niyatasya vyatireka vākye nvaya gatiḥ  /
yadi nāma ākāśa ādau sādhya abhāve sādhana abhāvaḥ
tathā api kimīd hetu sambhave sādhya sambhavaḥ
iti āha nahi iti

original: svabhāvena pratibandho yastsminnasatyekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā nāparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ // 30 //
analyzed: svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ yaḥ tsmin asati ekasya sādhyasya nivṛttyā na aparasya sādhanasya niyamena yuktā niyamavatī nivṛttiḥ  /

original: sa ca svabhāvapratibandho dviprakāraḥ sarvasya pratibaddhasya /
analyzed: sa ca svabhāva pratibandhaḥ dvi prakāraḥ sarvasya pratibaddhasya

original: tādātmyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ nimittaṃ yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: tādātmyam lakṣaṇam nimittam yasya sa tathā uktaḥ

original: yo yatra pratibaddhastasya sa pratibandhaviṣayo 'rthaḥ svabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ vāsyat anyasmin prasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yatra pratibaddhaḥ tasya sa pratibandha viṣayaḥ rthaḥ svabhāvaḥ kāraṇam vā asyat anyasmin prasiddha tva anupapatteḥ
tasmāt dvi prakāraḥ saḥ iti uktam
sa ca sādhye rthe liṅgasya iti atra antare bhihitaḥ

original: 32 tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho darśanīyaḥ /
analyzed: tena hi nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandhaḥ darśanīyaḥ

original: yacca pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvayavacanamiyekenāpi vākyena anvayamukhena vyatirekamukhena

original: vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavatīti nāvaśyaṃ
analyzed: vā prayuktena sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ liṅgasya sat asat tva khyāpanam kṛtam bhavati iti na avaśyam
vākya dvaya prayogaḥ
m iti tasya ātmā tad ātmā
tadā ātmanaḥ bhāvaḥ tādātmyam

original: tadutpattirlakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa tadutpattilakṣaṇa iti vigrahaḥ /

etat ca pūrvam uktam eva
yasmāt pratibandhe sati eka nivṛttyā apara nivṛttiḥ bhavati

original: abhāve na tena hetunā kasyacidekasya nivṛtyā aparanivṛttiramidhīyate /

etena nivarttya nivartakayoḥ pratibandhaḥ uktaḥ iti

original: iti cedāha- yadeva pratibandhopadarśanaṃ tadevānvaya iti /
analyzed: iti ced āha yat eva pratibandha upadarśanam tat eva anvayaḥ iti

original: tasmādekenāpi vākyenānvayamukhena vyatirekamukena vā prayuktena sapakṣāsapakṣayorliṅgasya sadasattvakhyāpanaṃ kṛta bhavatīti /
analyzed: tasmāt ekena api vākyena anvaya mukhena vyatireka mukena vā prayuktena sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ liṅgasya sat asat tva khyāpanam bhavati iti
anvaya mukhena
hiḥ yasmāt arthe

original: tena sādhyasya nivṛttau sādhanasya nivṛtti kathayatā pratibandho nivarttya nivartakayordarśanīyaḥ /

original: tasmāt sādhyanivṛtau yat sādhana nivṛttivacanaṃ tenākṣiptaṃ pratibandhopadarśanam /

pratibandhaḥ ced avaśyam darśayitavyaḥ

original: yasmāt dṛṣṭānte pramāṇena pratibandho darśyamāna evānvayaḥ,

original: tasmād ekasmin sādhanavākye dvayoranvaya vyatirekayoravaśyameva prayogau na na kartavyāḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ekasmin sādhana vākye dvayoḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ avaśyam eva prayogau na na kartavyāḥ

original: 33 anupalabdhāvapi yatsad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ tadupalabhyata evetyukte 'nupalabhyamānaṃ tādṛśamasaditi pratīteranvayadisśiḥ //
analyzed: anupalabdhau api yat sat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tat upalabhyate eva iti ukte nu palabhyamānam tādṛśam asat iti pratīteḥ
dvayoḥ api anayoḥ prayogayoḥ na avaśyam pakṣa nirdeśaḥ

original: prayogaḥ kriyate ced vyatirekamukhena karaṇamapi yuktameva,
analyzed: prayogaḥ kriyate ced vyatireka mukhena karaṇam api yuktam eva

original: tathāpi uktaprakāreṇa sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ sattvāsattvayorabhidhānameva sattvāsattvapradarśanaṃ bhavatīti ubhayenāpi liṅgena pratyekaṃ kriyate
analyzed: tathā api ukta prakāreṇa sapakṣa asapakṣayoḥ sattva asattvayoḥ abhidhānam eva sattva asattva pradarśanam bhavati iti ubhayena api liṅgena pratyekam kriyate
iti na avaśyam vākya dvaya prayogaḥ iti

original: tasmādekasminneva prayoge sādharmyavato vaidharmyavataśca vākyadvayasya prayogo nāvaśyaṃ kāryaḥ // 32 //
analyzed: tasmāt ekasmin eva prayoge sādharmyavataḥ vaidharmyavataḥ ca vākya dvayasya prayogaḥ na avaśyam kāryaḥ  /
evam kārya svabhāva hetvoḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ paraspara ākṣepaḥ bhihitaḥ
tṛtīya hetu nirdeśa artham āha anupalabdhau api iti
kārya svabhāva hetubhyām anadhigatasya iti
yadā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam yadi syāt
avaśyam upalabhyeta iti vyatirekaḥ ucyate
tadā upalabhdi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalambhe sāmarthyā atra asti iti pratīti jayite
tasmāt anvaya siddhiḥ ākṣiptaḥ eva
evam anvaya ākṣepaḥ uktaḥ
anupalabdhau vyatireka ākṣepaḥ tu svayam draṣṭavyaḥ iti

original: sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati cānumāne ubhayatrāi pakṣanirdeśo nāsti /
analyzed: sādharmyavati vaidharmyavati ca anumāne ubhayatra āi pakṣa nirdeśaḥ na asti

original: evaṃ ca pakṣānirdheśābhāva eva kalpyata iti cet?
analyzed: evam ca eva kalpyate iti ced
tatra āha dvayoḥ api iti

original: avaśyameva pakṣo nidehsyaḥ iti yo niyamaḥ, sa tu nāsti // 34 //
analyzed: avaśyam eva pakṣaḥ nidehsyaḥ iti yaḥ niyamaḥ sa tu na asti
artha gati arthaḥ hi śabda prayogaḥ
arthaḥ ced avagataḥ ki śabda prayogeṇa
ekam eva anvaya vākyam vyatireka vākyam vā prayoktavyam
anupalabdhau api vyatirekeṇa uktena anvaya gatiḥ
yat sat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam iti
sādhyasya asat vayavahāra yogya tvasya nivṛtti dṛśya sattva rūpām āha
tat upalabhyate eva iti
anupalambhasya nivṛttim upalambha rūpām āha
tat anena sādhya nivṛttiḥ sādhana nivṛtyā vyāptā darśitā

original: yadi ca sādhanasambhave 'pi sādhyanivṛttirbhavet na sādhanābhāvena vyāptā bhavet /
analyzed: yadi ca sādhana sambhave sādhya nivṛttiḥ bhavet na sādhana abhāvena vyāptā bhavet

original: ato vyāptiṃ pratipadyamānena sādhanasambhavaḥ sādhyasambhavena vyāptaḥ pratipattavyaḥ /
analyzed: atas vyāptim pratipadyamānena sādhana sambhavaḥ sādhya sambhavena vyāptaḥ pratipattavyaḥ
atas eva āha anupalabhyamānam tādṛśam iti
dṛśayam
asat iti pratīteḥ sampratyāt anvaya siddhiḥ iti

original: yataśca sādhanaṃ sādhyadharmapratibaddhaṃ tādātmya tadutpattibhyāṃ pratipattavyaṃ dvayorapi prayogayoḥ,
analyzed: yatas ca sādhanam sādhya dharma pratibaddham tādātmya tad utpattibhyām pratipattavyam dvayoḥ api prayogayoḥ
tasmāt pakṣaḥ vaśyam eva na nirdheśyaḥ

original: yat sādhanaṃ sādhyaniyataṃ pratītaṃ tata eva sādhyadharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhyapratītiḥ /
analyzed: yat sādhanam sādhya niyatam pratītam tatas eva sādhya dharmiṇi dṛṣṭāt sādhya pratītiḥ
atas na kiñcid sādhya nirdaśana iti
yasmāt sādharmyavat prayoge pi yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam tat na upalabhyate saḥ sat vayavahāra viṣayaḥ

original: nopalabhyate cātrāpi upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpto ghaṭa iti sāmarthyādeva iha ghaṭo nāstīti bhavati //
analyzed: na upalabhyate ca atra api upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ ghaṭaḥ iti sāmarthyāt eva iha ghaṭaḥ na asti iti bhavati

original: 36 tathā vaidharmyavatprayoge 'pi yaḥ sadvayavahāraviṣaya upalabdhilaksāṇaprāptaḥ sa upalabhyata eva /
analyzed: tathā vaidharmyavat prayoge pi yaḥ sat vayavahāra viṣayaḥ upalabdhi laksāṇa prāptaḥ saḥ upalabhyate eva

original: na tathātra tādṛśo ghaṭa upalabhyate ityukte sāmarthyādeva neha sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti bhavati //
analyzed: na tathā atra tādṛśaḥ ghaṭaḥ upalabhyate iti ukte sāmarthyāt eva na iha sat vayavahāra viṣayaḥ iti bhavati

original: upalabdhilakṣaṇarpāpto yāvānnopalabhyate sa sarvo 'sadvayavahāraviṣaya iti nikhilapadārthosaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kārya iti /
analyzed: upalabdhi lakṣaṇa ṛpa āptaḥ yāvān na upalabhyate sa sarvaḥ sat vayavahāra viṣayaḥ iti nikhila padārtha usaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ kāryaḥ iti

original: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇānvayo yatra ca pakṣadharmaḥ ityetayonirdeśa tacca sādhyaṃ tatra sāmarthyena siddhayatīti pakṣanirdeśasya kiṃ praojanam?
analyzed: nikhila padārtha upasaṃhāreṇa anvayaḥ yatra ca pakṣa dharmaḥ tat ca sādhyam tatra sāmarthyena pakṣa nirdeśasya kim

original: nikhilapadārthopasaṃhāreṇa yo vyatirekanirdeśaḥ pakṣadharmaśceti tadubhayasāmarthyena pratijñāpratītenaṃ pratijñānirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: nikhila padārtha upasaṃhāreṇa yaḥ vyatireka nirdeśaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ ca iti tad ubhaya sāmarthyena pratijñā pratītenam pratijñānirdeśaḥ
anyathā yat na pratīyate tat nidiśyeta

tat pariccidyamānam a viccadyamāna parihāreṇa sthita rūpam draṣṭavyam
nīle ca pariccedyamāne tādrūpya pracyutiḥ avaccidyate
tad avyavaccede nīla aparicceda prasaṅgāt
tasmāt vastunaḥ bhāva abhāvau paraspara parihāreṇa sthita rūpau
nīlāt tu yat anyat rūpam tat nīla abhāvāḥ vyabhicāri
nīlasya dṛśyasya pīta ādau upalabhyamāne n upalambhāt abhāva niścayāt
yathā ca nīlam svabhāvam pariharati
tadvat abhāva avyabhicāri pīta ādikam api iti
tathā ca bhāva abhavayoḥ sākṣāt virodhaḥ
vastunoḥ tu anyonyā bhāva avyabhicāri tvāt virodhaḥ
kasya ca anyatra abhāva avasāyaḥ
yaḥ niyata ākāraḥ rthaḥ tasya
na tu aniyata ākāraḥ
kṣaṇika tva ādi vat
kṣaṇika tvam hi sarveṣām nīla ādīnām svarūpa ātmakam

original: ato na niyatākāram yataḥ kṣaṇikatvaparihāreṇa na kiñcid dṛśyate /
analyzed: atas na niyata ākāram yatas kṣaṇika tva parihāreṇa na kiñcid dṛśyate
na niyata ākāraḥ
katham aniyata ākāraḥ nāma
yāvatā vastu rūpa vivikta ākāraḥ kalpitaḥ bhāvaḥ

original: tato dṛsṭaṃ kalpitaṃ vā niyataṃ rūpamanyatrāsadityavasīyate, nāniyatam /
analyzed: tatas dṛsṭam kalpitam vā niyatam rūpam anyatra asat iti avasīyate na aniyatam
evam nitya tva piśāca ādiḥ api niyata ākāraḥ kalpitaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
eka ātma tva virodhaḥ ca ayam
yayoḥ hi paraspara parihāreṇa avasthānam tayoḥ eka tva abhāvaḥ
atas eva lākṣaṇikaḥ yam virodhaḥ ucyate
lakṣaṇam rūpam
vastūnām prayojanam asya iti kṛtvā
virodhena hi anena vastu tvam vibhaktam vyavasthāpyate
atas eva dṛśyamāne rūpe yat niṣidhyate
tat dṛśyam eva abhyupagamya niṣidhyate

original: tathā hi- abhāvo 'pi piśāco 'pi yadā pīte niṣedbhūmiṣyate,
analyzed: tathā hi yadā

original: tadā dṛśyātmataya niṣedhya iti dṛśyatvamabhyupagamya dṛśyānupalabdhereva niṣedhaḥ /
analyzed: tadā dṛśya ātma tayā niṣedhyaḥ iti dṛśya tvam abhyupagamya dṛśya anupalabdheḥ eva niṣedhaḥ

original: tathā ca sati rūpe pariccidyamāna ekasmistadabhāvo dṛśyo vyavaccidyate /
analyzed: tathā ca sati rūpe pariccidyamāne ekasmin tad abhāvaḥ dṛśyaḥ vyavaccidyate
yat ca tad abhāvavat ni yata ākāram rūpam
tat api dṛśyam vyavaccidyate

original: tataḥ dvapracyutivat pracyutimanto 'pi vyavaccinnā iti ye parasparaparihārasthitarūpāḥ sarve te 'nena niṣiddhakatvāditi /
analyzed: tatas dvi pracyuti vat pracyutimantaḥ pi vyavaccinnāḥ iti ye paraspara parihāra sthita rūpāḥ sarve te nena niṣiddhaka tvāt iti
sati api ca asmin virodhe saha avasthānam syāt api
tatas bhinna vyāpāraḥ virodhau
ekena virodhena śīta uṣṇa sparśayoḥ eka tvam vāryate
anyena saha avasthānam
bhinna viṣāyau ca
sakale vastuni avastuni ca paraspara parihāra virodhaḥ
vastuni eva katipaye saha anavasthāna virodhaḥ
tasmāt bhinna vyāparaḥ
bhinna viṣayau ca
tatas na anayoḥ anyonya antarbhāvaḥ iti

original: sa cāyaṃ dvividho 'pi virodho vaktṛtvaṃ ca sarvajñatvaṃ ca tayorna sambhavati /
analyzed: sa ca ayam virodhaḥ vaktṛ tvam ca sarvajña tvam ca tayoḥ na sambhavati
na ca aviruddha vidheḥ anupalabdhau api abhāva gatiḥ
rāga ādīnām vacana ādeḥ ca kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddheḥ
artha antarasya ca akāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacana ādi nirvṛttiḥ
avikala kāraṇasya sataḥ sarvajñatva pariniṣpattau api iṣṭā
vaktṛ tva parihāreṇa api sarvajña tvasya na vyavasthitiḥ
nā api vā sarvajña tva parihāreṇa vaktṛ tvasya vyavasthitiḥ

original: virodhābhāve ca aviruddhavadvaktṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvāvaviparyayeṇopalabhyata iti cet?
analyzed: virodha abhāve ca aviruddha vat vaktṛ tvam sarvajña tvau aviparyayeṇa upalabhyate iti ced

original: yatra viruddhatvena nābhidhānaṃ tatra vastunoranupalabdhāvapi nābhāvaniścayaḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: yatra viruddha tvena nā abhidhānam tatra vastunoḥ anupalabdhau api nā abhāva niścayaḥ sambhavati
asarvajña tve sādhye vaktṛ tvasya vyatirekaḥ tathā eva sandigdhaḥ
rāga ādimattvena nirdeśe vyatireka sandeha kathana artham āha rāga ādīnām iti
rāga ādiḥ vacanasya hetuḥ iti etat asiddham
astu rāga ādi vacanayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ siddhaḥ
tatas kim iti ced āha
na hi avikala kāraṇasya sarvajñatvasya vaktṛ tva bhāvāt abhāva gatiḥ
sarvajña tvam hi adṛśyam
adṛṣṭasya ca abhāvaḥ
tatas nā anena virodha gatiḥ bhavati
na ca vaktṛ tva parihāreṇa sarvajña tvam avasthitam
kāṣṭha ādayaḥ hi vaktṛ tva parihṛtāḥ
teṣām api sarvajña tva prasaṅgāt
nā api sarvajñatva parihāreṇa vaktṛ tvam kāṣṭhā ādīnām api vaktṛ tva prasaṅgāt
tatas eva avirodhāt vaktṛ tva vidheḥ na sarvajña tva niṣedhaḥ
syāt etat yadi na asti eva virodhaḥ ghaṭa paṭayoḥ iva
syāt api tayoḥ saha avasthiti darśanam
saha avasthiti adarśanāt tu virodha gatiḥ
virodhāt ca abhāva gatiḥ
iya āśaṅkayā āha na ca aviruddha vidheḥ iti
anupalabdhau api na ayam viruddha vidhiḥ
saha avasthāna anupalambhaḥ tathā api na tayoḥ virodhaḥ

api tu dvayoḥ upalabhyamānayoḥ nivartya nivartaka bhāva avasāyāt

atas smāt na anyasya abhāva gatiḥ

original: yato yadi vacanādi rāgādīnāṃ kārya syād,

original: tathāhi yasmād vaktṛtvasarvajñatvayoḥ ko 'pi virodho nāsti /

original: tatmāt asarvajñanivṛttyā rāgādinivṛttyā vā vacananivṛttiḥ sandigdhā /

atha kāṇādaiḥ kaiścid sāmānyasya sarvagata tvam uktam
aparaiḥ ca kāṇādaiḥ sāma abhāvam
tasya hi yeṣām sambandhī svabhāvaḥ
tad niyamena teṣām deśe sannihitam bhavati
tatas tad sambandhi tva anubandhinī tad deśa sannihitā sāmānyasya
nanu ca gavām sambandhī svāmī
na ca go deśe sannihita svabhāvaḥ
tat katham tad sambandhi tvāt tad deśa tvam
iti āha na hi iti

original: yo yatra deśe nāsti sa deśo yasya sa taddeśaḥ taṃ na vyāpnotītyātmanā svarūpeṇa /
analyzed: yaḥ yatra deśe na asti sa deśaḥ yasya sa tad deśaḥ tam na vyāpnoti iti ātmanā sva rūpeṇa

original: iha sāmānyasya tadvatāṃ ca samavāyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhah,
analyzed: iha sāmānyasya tadvatām ca samavāya lakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ
sa ca abhinna deśayoḥ eva

original: tena yatra tay samavetaṃ tat tadātmīyena rūpeṇa kroḍīkurvat samavāyirūpa deśe svātmānaṃ niveśayati /
analyzed: tena yatra samavetam tat tad ātmīyena rūpeṇa kroḍīkurvat samavāyi rūpa deśe sva ātmānam niveśayati
tad deśa rūpa niveśanam eva tat kroḍīkaraṇam
tatas tad samavāyaḥ

original: tasmād yat tatra samavetaṃ tat tad dravyaṃ vyāpnuvadātmā taddeśe sannihitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tasmāt yat tatra samavetam tat tat dravyam vyāpnuvat ātmā tad deśe sannihitam bhavati
tat ayam arthaḥ tad deśa stha vastu vyāpanam tad deśa sattayā vyāptam

original: taddeśasattābhāve tadvayāpanābhāvāt vyāpanalakṣaṇaḥ samavāyasambandho na syāt /
analyzed: tad deśa sattā abhāve tad vayāpana abhāvāt vyāpana lakṣaṇaḥ samavāya sambandhaḥ na syāt
asti ca vyāpanam
atas tad deśe sannihita tvam iti yat ayam svabhāva hetuḥ
paiṭhara prayogam darśayan āha dvitīya pi iti
yat upalabdheḥ lakṣaṇa tām viṣaya tām prāptam dṛśyam iti arthaḥ

original: etena dṛśyānupalabdhimanūdaya na tat tatrāsti ityasadvayavahāryatvaṃ vihitam /
analyzed: etena dṛśya anupalabdhim anūdaya na tat tatra asti iti asat vayavahārya tvam vihitam
tatas vyāpya dṛśya anupalabdheḥ vyāpakam asat vayavahārya tvam darśitam
tat ayathā iti kvacid asan ghaṭaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ
trirūpī hetuḥ uktaḥ

original: tāvatā nārthapratītiriti na pṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma sādhanāvayavaḥ kaścit /
analyzed: tāvatā na artha pratītiḥ iti na pṛthak dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma sādhana avayavaḥ kaścid
tena na asya lakṣaṇam pṛthak ucyate gatārtha tvāt
nyasya kevala āśraya sarva gata tvam eva aṅgīkṛtam
tad naya pradarśana artham āha dvitīyaḥ iti
tat ca sugamam
yat upalabdhi iti
atra anupalabdheḥ anvayaḥ kathitaḥ
vyakteḥ antarālāni vyakti antarālāni vyakti antarāṇi
teṣu upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam na upalabhyate
anena pakṣa dharmaḥ uktaḥ
tad vādinā ca kevala āśraya sarvagata tvam uktam   /
avyavahita uktyā anupalabdhyā sāmānyasya kevala āśraya sarvagata tvam sādhyate

original: prākca svabhāvahetunā sarvasarvagatatvaṃ sādhitamiti dvābhyāṃ parasparaviruddhārthasādhanāt
analyzed: prāk ca svabhāva hetunā sarva sarvagata tvam sādhitam iti dvābhyām paraspara viruddha artha sādhanāt
kim vyakti antarāleṣu sāmānya anupalabdheḥ kevala āśraya sarva gata tvam eva sarva deśa avasthita sva sambandhiṣu

original: anubaddhatvāt sarvasarvagatatvameva veti anubhavādekasminneva sāmānye sandehī jāyate /
analyzed: anubaddha tvāt sarva sarva gata tvam eva vā iti anubhavāt ekasmin eva sāmānye sandehī jāyate
evam iyatā parārtha anumānam tad svarūpaiḥ darśitam
dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam kasmāt na uktam iti ced
tatra āha tri rūpaḥ iti

original: pūrva hetorlakṣaṇatrayaṃ yaduktaṃ tenaiva rūpatrayeṇa sādhyārthasiddhirbhavati /
analyzed: hetoḥ lakṣaṇa trayam yat uktam tena eva rūpa trayeṇa sādhya artha siddhiḥ bhavati

original: tena dṛṣṭānto nāma pṛthak sādhanāvayavo nāsti /
analyzed: tena dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma pṛthak sādhana avayavaḥ na asti
tatas ca tad lakṣaṇam
pakṣa dharma tvam darśayitum āha na upalabhyate ca iti
vyakti antarālam vyakti antaram ca vyakti śūnyam ca ākāśam

original: dṛśyamapi kasyāñcid vyaktī gosāmānyamaśvādiṣu vyaktyantareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe nopalabhyate /
analyzed: dṛśyam api kasyāñcid vyaktī go sāmānyam aśva ādiṣu vyakti antareṣu vyakti śūnye ca ākāśe nā upalabhyate
tasmāt na teṣu asti iti gamyate

original: ayamanupalambhaḥ pūrvoktaśca svabhāvaḥ parasya viruddhau yavathau tayoḥ sādhanāt tāvekasmin dharmiṇi saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ /
analyzed: ayam anupalambhaḥ pūrva uktaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ parasya viruddhau yavathau tayoḥ sādhanāt tau ekasmin dharmiṇi saṃśayam janayataḥ
na hi ekaḥ rthaḥ paraspara viruddha svabhāvaḥ bhavitum arhati

original: ekena cātra vyaktyantareṣu vyaktiśūnye cākāśe sattvam /
analyzed: ekena ca atra vyakti antareṣu vyakti śūnye ca ākāśe sattvam
apareṇa ca anupalambhena asattvam sādhyate

original: na caikasyaikasaikatra sattvamasattvaṃ ca yuktamḥ tayovirodhāt /
analyzed: na ca ekasya ekasā ekatra sattvam asattvam ca yuktam tayoḥ virodhāt

original: tadāgamasiddhasya sāmānyasya sarvagatatvāsarvagatatvayoḥ sādhyayoreto viruddhāvyabhicāriṇī jātau /
analyzed: tad āgama siddhasya sāmānyasya sarvagata tva asarvagata tvayoḥ sādhyayoḥ etaḥ viruddha avyabhicāriṇī jātau
yatas sāmānyasya ekasya yugapad sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ abhisambandhi tvam ca abhyupagatam
dṛśya tvam ca tatas sarva sambandhi tvāt sarvagata tvam
dṛśya tvāt antarālāt anupalambhāt asarvagata tvam

original: tataḥ śāstrakārreṇaiva viruddhavyaptatvamapaśyatā viruddhavyāptī dharmāvuktvā viruddhāvyabhicāryavakāśo datta iti /
analyzed: tatas śāstrakārreṇa eva viruddha vyapta tvam apaśyatā viruddha vyāptī dharmau uktvā viruddha avyabhicāri avakāśaḥ dattaḥ iti
na ca vastuni asya sambahvaḥ  /
iti uktāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: nanu ca sādhanāvayavatvād yathā hetava uktāḥ,
analyzed: nanu ca sādhana avayava tvāt yathā hetavaḥ uktāḥ
tad prasaṅgena ca hetvā

original: 122 hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvamasapakṣācca sarvato vyāvṛtto rūpamuktamabhedena /
analyzed: hetoḥ sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam asapakṣāt ca sarvatas vyāvṛttaḥ rūpam uktam abhedena
punar viśeṣeṇa kārya svabhāvayoḥ ukta lakṣaṇayoḥ janma tanmātra anubandhī darśanīyau uktau
tat ca darśayatā yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ
asati agnau na kvacid dhūmaḥ
yathā mahānasa itarayoḥ
yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra anitya tvam
gatārtha tvāt iti hetvarthena eva dṛṣṭānta arthasya avagamāt
katham iti ced āha hetoḥ iti

original: prayogamātra etadeva hetorlakṣaṇam- sapakṣa eva sattvam ityevarūpam /
analyzed: prayoga mātre etat eva hetoḥ lakṣaṇam sapakṣe eva sattvam iti evarūpam

original: tathā sarvasmād vipakṣād vyāvṛtiḥ ityevaṃrūpam ca /
analyzed: tathā sarvasmāt vipakṣāt vyāvṛtiḥ iti evaṃrūpam ca

original: viśeṣeṇa ca hetorlakṣaṇam- kāryahetorjanma pradarśanīyam ityuktam,
analyzed: viśeṣeṇa ca hetoḥ lakṣaṇam kārya hetoḥ janma pradarśanīyam iti uktam
svabhāva hetoḥ tanmātra anubandhaḥ kathanīyaḥ iti uktam
sāmānay lakṣaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ca darśayata iti śeṣaḥ
kārya hetoḥ hi svakīya kṣaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam
tathā ca yogyam

original: evaṃ ca darśayatā viśeṣeṇa kathayatā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca darśayatā viśeṣeṇa kathayatā iti arthaḥ
tathā hi atra sapakṣa sattvam pradarśayatā

original: bhāsāḥ, tathā sādhanāvayatvād dṛṣṭāntā vaktavyāḥ tatprasaṅgena ca dṛṣṭāntā bhāṣāḥ tat kathaṃ noktāḥ?
analyzed: bhāsāḥ tathā sādhana avaya tvāt dṛṣṭāntāḥ vaktavyāḥ tad prasaṅgena ca dṛṣṭāntāḥ bhāṣāḥ tat katham na uktāḥ
iti āha trirūpaḥ hetuḥ uktaḥ
tat kim dṛṣṭāntaiḥ
syāt etat tāvatā nā artha pratītiḥ
iti āha tāvatā ca iti
ukta lakṣaṇena eva hetunā bhavati sādhya pratītiḥ
atas saḥ eva gamakaḥ
tatas tat vacanam eva gamakam
na dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma sādhanasya avayavaḥ
yatas ca ārya na avayavaḥ

original: tena nāsya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇaṃ hetulakṣaṇāt pṛthagucyate /
analyzed: tena na asya dṛṣṭāntasya lakṣaṇam hetu lakṣaṇāt pṛthak ucyate
katham tarhi hetoḥ vyāpti niśrayaḥ
yadi a dṛṣṭāntakaḥ hetuḥ iti ced
na ucyate hetuḥ adṛṣṭāntakaḥ eva

original: api tu na hetoḥ pṛthagdṛṣṭānto nāma /
analyzed: api tu na hetoḥ pṛthak dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma
hetu antarbhūtaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: ata evoktam- nāsya pṛthag lakṣaṇamucyate iti /
analyzed: atas eva uktam na asya pṛthak lakṣaṇam ucyate iti
na tu evam uktam na asya lakṣaṇam ucyate iti
yadi evam lakṣaṇam vaktavyam eva
iti āha gatārtha tvāt
gataḥ rthaḥ prayojanam

original: abhidheyaṃ vā yasya dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇasya, tat tathā /
analyzed: abhidheyam vā yasya dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇasya tat tathā
tasya bhāvaḥ ta tvam tasmāt
dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇam hi ucyate dṛṣṭānta pratītiḥ yathā syāt
dṛṣṭāntaḥ ca hetu lakṣaṇāt eva avasitaḥ
tatas dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇasya yat prayojanam dṛṣṭānta pratītiḥ
tad gatam niṣpannam
abhidheyam va gatam jñātam dṛṣṭānta ākhyam
katham gatārtha tvam
iti āha hetoḥ rūpam uktam abhedena
sāmānyena
sādhāraṇam kārya svabhāva anupalambhanām etat lakṣaṇam iti arthaḥ
kim punar tat
yathā ghaṭa ākāśayoḥ iti darśanīyam

original: na hyanyathā sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre śakye darśayitum /
analyzed: na hi anyathā sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sat asat tve yathā ukta prakāre śakye darśayitum
tad kārya tā niyamaḥ kārya liṅgasya
svabhāva liṅgasya ca svabhāvena
avaśyam yathā mahānasaḥ iti abhidheyam
anyathā sapakṣa sattvam eva kathayitu na śakyate

original: tathaiva vyāvṛtti kathayatāpyavaśyaṃ yathā jalam ityābhidheyam /
analyzed: tathā eva vyāvṛtti kathayatā api avaśyam yathā jalam
anyathā vyāvṛttiḥ eva na uktā syāt

original: anena svabhāvahetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ ca yathā vaktavyaṃ tathā darśyate /
analyzed: anena svabhāva hetoḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam ca yathā vaktavyam tathā darśyate

original: iha yadi yathā ghaṭaḥ iti nocyate tadā sapakṣasattvameva kathayituṃ na śakyate /
analyzed: iha yadi yathā ghaṭaḥ iti nā ucyate tadā sapakṣa sattvam eva kathayitum na śakyate
yadi yathā ākāśam iti na ucyate
tadā vyāvṛttiḥ api kathayitum na śakyate
tanmātra anubandhaḥ tathā eva darśayitum na śakyam

original: tathāhi yadi yatra yatra kṛtakatvaṃ tatra tatrāvaśyaṃ nityatvam,
analyzed: tathā hi yadi yatra yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra tatra avaśyam nitya tvam
yathā ghaṭe iti nirdiśyate
tadā tanmātra anubandhaḥ eva uktaḥ bhavati
sapakṣaḥ eva yat sattvam
vipakṣāt ca sarvasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ yā rūpa dvayam etat abhedena uktam
na ca sāmānyam uktam api śakyam jñātum
atas tat eva viśeṣa niṣṭham vaktavyam

original: ataḥ punarapi viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janmatanmātrānubandhau darśanīyāvaktau /
analyzed: atas punar api viśeṣeṇa viśeṣavantau janma tanmātra anubandhau darśanīyau aktau
kāryasya janma jñātavyam uktam

original: janmani hi jñāte kāryasya sapakṣe eva sattvam,
analyzed: janmani hi jñāte kāryasya sapakṣe eva sattvam
vipakṣāt ca sarvasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ jñātā bhavati
svabhavasya tanmātra anubandhaḥ darśanīyaḥ uktaḥ
tat iti sādhanam
tat eva tanmātram sādhana mātram
tasya anubandhaḥ anugamanam
sādhana mātrasya bhāve bhāvaḥ sādhyasya
tanmātra bhāvi tvam eva hi sādhyasya tādātmyam

original: sādhanasya yadā svabhāvo jñāto bhavati tadā svabhāvahetoḥ- sapakṣe eva sattvam,
analyzed: sādhanasya yadā svabhāvaḥ jñātaḥ bhavati tadā svabhāva hetoḥ sapakṣe eva sattvam
vipakṣāt ca sarvasmāt vyāvṛttiḥ jñātā bhavati
tat evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam viśeṣa ātmakam jñātavyam na anaythā
tatas viśeṣa laksāṇam uktam
kim atas yadi nāma evam
iti āha tat ca iti

original: tacca sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ darśayitukāmena viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ darśayatā eva darśanīyam- iti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca sāmānya lakṣaṇam darśayitu kāmena viśeṣa lakṣaṇam darśayatā eva darśanīyam iti sambandhaḥ
yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ iti
kārya hetoḥ vyāpti darśi tā
vyāptiḥ ca kārya karaṇa bhāva sādhanāt pramāṇāt niścauyate
tatas yathā mahānase iti darśanīyam

original: asatyagnau na bhavatyeva dhūma iti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
analyzed: asati agnau na bhavati eva dhūmaḥ iti vyatirekaḥ darśitaḥ
sa ca yathā itarasmin iti darśanīyaḥ
vahni nivṛttiḥ hi dhūma nivṛttau niyatā darśanīyā
sā ca mahānasāt itaratra iti darśanīyā

original: vyāptiḥ / asmiścārthe darśite eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
analyzed: vyāptiḥ asmin ca arthe darśite eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati
etāvat mātra rūpa tvāt tasya iti

original: sapakṣatvaṃ darśayatā yadi yathā mahānasaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti vā nocyate,
analyzed: sapakṣa tvam darśayatā yadi yathā mahānasaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ iti vā na ucyate
tadā sapakṣa sattvam eva ukta na syāt

original: yadi ca vipakṣāsattvaṃ darśayatā yathā jalam yathā ākāśam iti vā nicyate,
analyzed: yadi ca vipakṣa asattvam darśayatā yathā jalam yathā ākāśam iti vā nicyate
tadā vyāvṛttiḥ eva na uktā syāt
evam sāmānya lakṣaṇam uktvā aśakya tvam uktam
viśeṣa lakṣaṇena aśakya tva kathana anantaram āha tad kāryatā ityādi
tasya kārya tat kāryam
tasya bhāvaḥ tad kārya tā

original: kāraṇasattve kāryasyāpi sattvam ityeṣa niyama eva tatkāryatāniyamaḥ /
analyzed: kāraṇa sattve kāryasya api sattvam iti eṣa niyamaḥ eva tad kārya tā niyamaḥ
svarūpeṇa vyāptiḥ eva svabhāvena vyāptiḥ
tanmātra anubandhaḥ iti śeṣaḥ
tat ubhayam api dṛṣṭāntam an uktvā vaktum na śakyate

original: yadā yathoktanyāyena kvacid dharmiṇi hetuḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇato viśeṣalakṣaṇataścocyate,
analyzed: yadā yathā ukta nyāyena kvacid dharmiṇi hetuḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇataḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇataḥ ca ucyate
tadā dṛṣṭāntaḥ pi uktaḥ eva
tat ca kasmāt iti ced
āha etāvat ityādi
yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra
nitya tvam iti svabhāva hetoḥ vyāpti darśi tā

original: anityatvābhāve na bhavatyena kṛtakatvamiti vyatireko darśitaḥ /
analyzed: anitya tva abhāve na bhavati ena kṛtaka tvam iti vyatirekaḥ darśitaḥ
vyāptreḥ ca sādhakaiḥ pramāṇam sādharmya dṛṣṭānte darśanīyam

original: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyani vṛttau nivṛttirniyatā darśanīyā /
analyzed: prasiddha vyāptikasya ca hetoḥ sādhyani vṛttau nivṛttiḥ niyatā darśanīyā
tat avaśyam yathā ghaṭe
yathā ākāśe ca iti darśanīyam
kasmāt evam
iti āha na ha iti

original: yasmādanyathā sāmānya lakṣaṇarūpe sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathoktaprakāre iti niyate- sapakṣe eva sattvam,
analyzed: yasmāt anyathā sāmānya lakṣaṇa rūpe sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sat asat tve yathā ukta prakāre iti niyate sapakṣe eva sattvam
vipakṣa sattvam eva iti niyamaḥ yathā ukta prakāraḥ
te na śakye darśayitum

original: viśeṣalakṣaṇe hi darśite yathoktaprakāre sadasatve darśite bhavataḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣa lakṣaṇe hi darśite yathā ukta prakāre sat asatve darśite bhavataḥ
na ca viśeṣa lakṣaṇam anyathā śakyam darśayitum
tasya sādhyasya kārya dhūmaḥ
tasya bhāvaḥ tad kārya tā

original: saiva niyamo yatastatkāryatāyā dhūmo dahane niyataḥ /
analyzed: sā eva niyamaḥ yatas tad kārya tāyāḥ dhūmaḥ dahane niyataḥ
saḥ yam tad kārya tā niyamaḥ viśeṣa lakṣaṇa rūpaḥ nyathā darśayitum aśakyaḥ

original: svabhāvaliṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāpti viśeṣalakṣaṇarūpā na śakyā darśayitum /
analyzed: svabhāva liṅgasya ca svabhāvena sādhyena vyāpti viśeṣa lakṣaṇa rūpā na śakyā darśayitum

original: yasmāt kāryakāraṇabhāvastādātmyaṃ ca mahānase ghaṭe ca jḥātavyam,
analyzed: yasmāt kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tādātmyam ca mahānase ghaṭe ca

original: tasmād vyāptisādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśayatā sādharmyadṛṣṭānto darśanīyaḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntastu prasiddhe tatkāryatve kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāvapratipattyartham
analyzed: tasmāt vyāpti sādhanam pramāṇam darśayatā sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ darśanīyaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ tu prasiddhe tad kārya tve kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāva pratipatti artham
tatas eva na avaśyam vastu bhavati
kāraṇa abhāve kārya abhāvaḥ vastuni avstuni vā
tatas vastu avastu vā vaidharmya
etena eva dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ api nirastāḥ bhavanti
yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt
karmavat paramāṇu vat ghaṭa vat iti
ete dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ sādhya sādhana dharma ubhaya vikalāḥ
tathā hi tasya rūpam etāvat mātrā īmā iva
yatra sādhyena hetoḥ anvayaḥ dṛśyate
sa sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: yatra ca sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvo nirdiśyate sa vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ // 122 //
analyzed: yatra ca sādhya abhāve hetu abhāvaḥ nirdiśyate sa vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: yasmād yadā hetoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇayonirdeśaḥ kriyate sa nirduṣṭhadṛṭānta ityucyate
analyzed: yasmāt yadā hetoḥ sāmānya viśeṣa lakṣaṇayoḥ nirdeśaḥ kriyate sa nirduṣṭhadṛṭāntaḥ iti ucyate

original: tasmād yatra tallakṣaṇayornirdeśo na sambhavati sa dṛṣṭāntābhāso bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati // 123 //
analyzed: tasmāt yatra tad lakṣaṇayoḥ nirdeśaḥ na sambhavati sa dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ bhavati iti uktam bhavati
udāha arṇāni āha yathā iti
sādhya sādhana dharma ubhaya vikalāḥ iti

amūrta tvat karmavat iti
paramāṇu vat iti sādhana dharma vikalaḥ

original: tasmād dṛṣṭāntamantareṇa na hetoranvayo vyatireko vā śakyo darśayitum /
analyzed: tasmāt dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa na hetoḥ anvayaḥ vyatirekaḥ vā śakyaḥ darśayitum

original: ato heturūpākhyānādeva hetorvyāptisādhanasya pramāṇasya darśakaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
analyzed: atas hetu rūpa ākhyānāt eva hetoḥ vyāpti sādhanasya pramāṇasya darśakaḥ sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ

original: prasiddhavyāptikasya sādhyābhave hetvabhāvapradarśanād vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta upādeya iti ca darśitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: prasiddha vyāptikasya sādhya abhave hetu abhāva pradarśanāt vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ upādeyaḥ iti ca darśitam bhavati
asmin ca arthe darśite eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati

original: yo 'yamartho vyāpti prasādhanapramāṇapradarśanaḥ kaścidupādeyo nivṛttipradarśanaśca- ityasminnarthe darśite darśito dṛṣṭānta ityāha /
analyzed: yaḥ yam arthaḥ vyāpti prasādhana pramāṇa pradarśanaḥ kaścid upādeyaḥ nivṛtti pradarśanaḥ ca iti asmin arthe darśite darśitaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ iti āha
rūpam yasya

yat uta vyāpti sādhana pramāṇa pradarśaka tvam nāma sādharmya dṛṣṭāntasya

original: prasiddhavyāptikasya ca sādhyanivṛtau sādhananivṛttipradarśakatvam- ityetad vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya /
analyzed: prasiddha vyāptikasya ca sādhya nivṛtau sādhana nivṛtti pradarśaka tvam iti etat vaidharmya dṛṣṭāntasya

original: etenaiva ca heturūpākhyānād dṛṣṭāntatvapradarśanena dṛṣṭāntadoṣā dṛṣṭāntabhāsāḥ kathitā bhavanti /

original: tathā hi- pūrviktisiddhaye ya upādīyamāno 'pi dṛṣṭānto na samarthaḥ svakārya sādhayituṃ sa dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti sāmarthyāduktaṃ bhavati // 123

original: yaiśca vacanaiḥ sādhanadoṣā abidhyamānā api udbhāvyante tāni jātayo veditavyāḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ ca vacanaiḥ sādhana doṣāḥ a bidhyamānāḥ api udbhāvyante tāni jātayaḥ veditavyāḥ
samyak jñāna nirūpaṇa avasare katham dūṣaṇa tad ābhāsānām upadarśanam iti ced

original: ucyate, dūṣaṇānāṃ tayā dūṣaṇābhāsānāṃ ca nirūpaṇe samyagjñānamapi sasahāyaṃ nirūpitaṃ bhavatoti /
analyzed: ucyate dūṣaṇānām tayā dūṣaṇa ābhāsānām ca nirūpaṇe samyak jñānam api sa sahāyam nirūpitam bhavatā iti

original: tathā caitā hyatra dūṣaṇā iti tāsāṃ pariharo vidheyaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ca etāḥ hi atra dūṣaṇāḥ iti tāsām pariharaḥ vidheyaḥ
yadā vai ete dūṣaṇa ābhāsāḥ
etebhyaḥ śaṅkā bhāvaḥ eva veditavyaḥ iti abhidhīyate
tadā samyak jñānam eva sarvathā nirūpitam bhavati
tasmāt yathā ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ na asti

original: dūṣaṇaṃ vivarītumāha- ye pūrva nyūnatādayo 'siddhaviruddhānaikāntikā uktāḥ,
analyzed: dūṣaṇam vivarītum āha ye nyūna tā ādayaḥ siddha viruddha anaikāntikāḥ uktāḥ
teṣām udbhāvakam yat vacanam tat dūṣaṇam
nanu ca nyūna tā ādayaḥ na viparyaya sādhanāḥ
tat katham dūṣaṇam

original: ityāha- tena nyūnatādivacanena pareṣāmiṣṭaścāsāvarthaśca tasya siddhiḥ niścayaḥ,
analyzed: iti āha tena nyūna tā ādi vacanena pareṣām iṣṭaḥ ca asau arthaḥ ca tasya siddhiḥ niścayaḥ
tasyāḥ pratibandhāt
na avaśyam viparyaya sādhanāt eva dūṣaṇam viruddha vat

original: api tu parasyābhipretaniścayavibandhānniścayābhāvo bhavati niścayaviparyaya ityastyeva viparyayasiddhiriti // 138 //
analyzed: api tu parasya abhipreta niścaya vibandhāt niścaya abhāvaḥ bhavati niścaya viparyayaḥ iti asti eva viparyaya siddhiḥ iti
uktā dūṣaṇā
dūṣaṇa ābhāsāḥ iti
dūṣaṇa vat ābhāsantaḥ iti dūṣaṇa ābhāṣā
ke te jātayaḥ iti
jāti śabdaḥ sādṛśya vacanaḥ
uttara sadṛśāni jāti uttarāṇi
uttarasya a prayukta tvāt uttara sadṛśāni jātyuttarāṇi
tat eva uttara sādṛśyam uttara sthāna prayukta tvena darśayitum āha abhūta iti
abhūtasya asatyasya doṣasya udbhavanāni
udbhāvyate etaiḥ iti audbhāvanāni vacanāni
tāni jāti uttarāṇi
jātyā sādṛśyena uttarāṇi jāti uttarāṇi iti

original: pṛthu yaccājitaṃ puṇyaṃ nyāyabidoḥ padaṃ padam /
analyzed: pṛthu yat ca ajitam puṇyam nyāya bidoḥ padam padam

prāṇi kulam aśeṣam hi yātu bhava parikṣayam
yathocittena mārgeṇa nirdeśena nṛpasya ca
iyam vinīta devena śiṣya kalyāṇa siddhaye

granthe vistara ṭīkāyām inā uktam paripiṇḍitam

syām atas ham

original: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hayavadat /

original: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
